original: idānīṃ kuṇḍacihnamucyate - iha vṛttakuṇḍa 'kamalakaṇikāyāṃ cihnaṃ padmam, caturasre cakram dhanurākāre kartī, pañcakoṇe khaṅgaḥ, saptakoṇe bāṇaḥ, trikoṇe vajrāṅkuśaḥ, ṣaṭkoṇe mohane sarpaḥ, aṣṭakoṇe śṛṅkhaleti
analyzed: idānīm kuṇḍa cihnam ucyate iha vṛtta kuṇḍa kamala kaṇikāyām cihnam padmam caturasre cakram dhanuḥ ākāre kartī pañcakoṇe khaṅgaḥ saptakoṇe bāṇaḥ trikoṇe vajrāṅkuśaḥ ṣaṭkoṇe

original: atra kuṇḍadvaye cihnaviparyā- sarachandovaśāditi cihna niyamaḥ || 10 ||
analyzed: atra kuṇḍa dvaye cihna viparyā sara chandaḥ vaśāt iti cihna niyamaḥ

original: eṣāṃ pramāṇamāha- ekadvayarddhaka hastaṃ khayugakhanayanaṃ khāgni khatvaṃṅgulaṃ syā- dardhāṅgā ṣaḍvibhāgādvaruṇaravivibhāgena khāniśca vedī
analyzed: eṣām pramāṇam āha hastam kha yuga kha nayanam kha agni syāḥ dardha aṅgā ṣaṣ vibhāgāt varuṇa ravi vibhāgena khāniḥ ca vedī

original: oṣṭhāścihnāvalī syādupari kulavaśādvedikāyāḥ samantā- dvedī bāhye'bjapatrāṇyapi kuru nṛpate śāntipuṣṭayorna cānye || 11 ||
analyzed: oṣṭhāḥ cihna āvalī syāt upari kula vaśāt vedikāyāḥ samantā dvedī bāhye bja patrāṇi api kuru nṛpate śānti puṣṭayoḥ na ca anye
eka ityādi

original: ekahastaṃ vṛttam, dvihastaṃ caturasram, arddhahastaṃ dhanurākāram, vṛttapramāṇaṃ pañcakoṇam, catvāriṃśadaṅgulaṃ saptakoṇam
analyzed: eka hastam vṛttam dvi hastam catur asram arddha hastam dhanuḥ ākāram vṛtta pramāṇam pañcakoṇam catvāriṃśat aṅgulam sapta koṇam

original: viśatyaṅgulaṃ trikoṇam, ṣaṭkoṇaṃ triśadaṅgulam, ṣaṣṭacaṅgulamaṣṭakoṇam, kuṇḍārddhamānā khāniḥ kuṇḍe ṣaḍvibhāgikā vediḥ kuṇḍadvādaśa- bhāgikamoṣṭham, cihnāvalī ca vedyāḥ samam, tadvāhye'bjapatrāṇi śāntipuṣṭayoḥ, śeṣaka' maṃṇi vedabāhye'nyadanyadvakṣyate
analyzed: viśati aṅgulam trikoṇam ṣaṣ koṇam triśat aṅgulam ṣaṣṭa caṅgulam aṣṭa koṇam kuṇḍa arddha mānā khāniḥ kuṇḍe ṣaṣ vibhāgikā vediḥ kuṇḍa dvādaśa bhāgikam oṣṭham

original: vajraṃ vā cihnaṃ sarvakarmaṇi kuṇḍamadhye jñātavyam || 11 ||
analyzed: vajram vā cihnam sarva karmaṇi kuṇḍa madhye jñātavyam

original: vajraṃ vā sarvakarmasvapi bhavati maho, kīlakaṃ cāṣṭabhede - nyagrodhāśvatthakāsthīnyayasakhadirajaṃ cūta dilvā kaṃjaṃ ca
analyzed: vajram vā sarva karmasu api bhavati kīlakam ca aṣṭa bhede nyagrodha aśvatthaka asthī nyayasa khadira jam cūta dilvā kaṃjam ca
trikoṇa ākṛṣṭau sapta koṇam
trikoṇe bāṇa saptakoṇe vajrāṅkuśaḥ
paṭale ślo

original: ] vajrācāryādisarva karmaprasarasādhanālakṣaṇamahoddeśaḥ evaṃ sphāṭikyakumbhā vararajata mayāḥ śrīkapālāyasāśva tāmrākhyā hemakumbhāḥ prakaṭitaniyatā dārujā mṛṇmayāśca || 12 ||
analyzed: vajra ācārya ādi sarva karma prasara sādhanā lakṣaṇa mahā uddeśaḥ evam sphāṭikya kumbhāḥ vara rajata mayāḥ hema kumbhāḥ prakaṭita niyatāḥ dāru jāḥ mṛṇmayāḥ ca

original: iha śāntike nyagrodha kīlakāḥ, darśādikkīlanārthaṃ puṣṭau aśvatthāḥ, māraṇe'- sthimayāḥ, uccāṭane āyasāḥ, vaśye 'khadirajāḥ, ākṛṣṭau cūtajāḥ, mohane'rkajāḥ, stambhane vilvajā iti kīlaka niyamaḥ, sārvakarmike udumbarajāḥ
analyzed: iha śāntike nyagrodha kīlakāḥ darśa ādiś kīlana artham puṣṭau aśvatthāḥ māraṇe sthimayāḥ uccāṭane āyasāḥ vaśye khadira jāḥ ākṛṣṭau cūta jāḥ mohane rka jāḥ stambhane vilva

original: idānīṃ kalaśā ucyante - śāntike sphāṭikakalaśāḥ, puṣṭau raupyā, māraṇe 'mānuṣakapālāḥ, uccāṭane vidveṣe āyasāḥ, vaśye sauvarṇāḥ, ākṛṣṭau tāmrāḥ, stambhane mṛṇmayāḥ, mohane dārujā daśakalaśā iti || 12 ||
analyzed: idānīm kalaśāḥ ucyante śāntike sphāṭika kalaśāḥ puṣṭau raupyāḥ māraṇe mānuṣa kapālāḥ uccāṭane vidveṣe āyasāḥ vaśye sauvarṇāḥ ākṛṣṭau tāmrāḥ stambhane mṛṇmayāḥ mohane

original: atha śāntipuṣṭyarthaṃ ghaṭalakṣaṇamucyate- vṛttā dvaṣṭāṅguloktā dviguṇitadaśakenocchritā dvyaṅguloṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍgrīvāṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ śaśadharadhavalā : śāntipuṣṭayorna cānye
analyzed: atha śānti puṣṭi artham ghaṭa lakṣaṇam ucyate vṛttā du aṣṭa aṅgula uktā dvi guṇita daśakena ucchritā dvi aṅgula uṣṭhāḥ ṣaṣ grīvā aṣṭa aṅgula āsyāḥ śaśadhara dhavalā

original: pūrvāhlādaṣṭayāmā: pratidinasamaye śāntipuṣṭyādike syu- revaṃ tatrārddhayāmedina niśisamaye cāṣṭakarma prakuryāt || 13 || || ||
analyzed: pūrva āhlāda ṣṭa yāmā prati dina samaye śānti puṣṭi ādike syuḥ revam tatra arddha yāme dina niśi samaye ca aṣṭakarma prakuryāt

original: iha kalaśagarbha vṛttena 'dvaṣṭāṅgulā uktāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulā uktāḥ
analyzed: iha kalaśagarbha vṛttena dvaṣṭa aṅgulāḥ uktāḥ ṣoḍaśa aṅgulāḥ uktāḥ

original: dviguṇi- tadaśakenocchritā ityadhaḥ kalaśagarbhāt mukhauṣṭhāntā viśatyaṅgulā ucchrayeṇeti
analyzed: dviguṇi tad aśakena ucchritāḥ iti adhas kalaśa garbhāt mukha oṣṭha antā viśati aṅgulā ucchrayeṇa iti

original: dvagu- loṣṭhā iti dvyaṅgulāvoṣṭau lambamānau yeṣāṃ te dvayaṅguloṣṭhā mukhādavadheḥ ṣaḍaṅgulagrīvā: aṣṭāṅgulāsyāḥ
analyzed: dvagu loṣṭhāḥ iti dvi aṅgulau oṣṭau lambamānau yeṣām te dvayaṅgula uṣṭhāḥ mukhāt avadheḥ ṣaṣ aṅgula grīvāḥ aṣṭa aṅgula āsyāḥ

original: oṣṭhāntādoṣṭhāntamukhamaṣṭāṅgulam, aṣṭhāṅgulaṃ bhāgatrayaṃ kṛtvā bhāgadvayena kaṇṭharandhraṃ bhāgaikenauṣṭhadvayāyāmaḥ te ca śaśadharadhavalā : śāntipuṣṭayorna cānye ghaṭāḥ syuriti
analyzed: oṣṭha antāt oṣṭha anta mukham aṣṭa aṅgulam aṣṭa aṅgulam bhāga trayam kṛtvā bhāga dvayena kaṇṭha randhram bhāga ekena oṣṭha dvaya āyāmaḥ te ca śaśadhara dhavalā śānti

original: sphāṭi ka' raupya kalaśānāmabhāve mṛṇmayā akālamūlakalaśāḥ śāli- piṣṭena candanena vā lipya dhavalāḥ kartavyāḥ
analyzed: sphāṭika raupya kalaśānām abhāve mṛṇmayāḥ akāla mūla kalaśāḥ śāli piṣṭena candanena vā lipya dhavalāḥ kartavyāḥ

original: tathā mūlatantre'pi bhagavatoktam - māraṇe narakapālāni śmaśānāṅgāracūrṇena naravasayā lipya kṛṣṇāni kārayed iti
analyzed: tathā mūlatantre pi bhagavatā uktam māraṇe nara kapālāni śmaśāna aṅgāra cūrṇena nara vasayā lipya kṛṣṇāni kārayet iti

original: uccāṭane vidveṣe dīrghagrīvā aṣṭāṅgulavaktrāḥ kṛṣṇāṅgā vṛttena dvādaśāṅgulāḥ, ucchrayeṇa catu- viśatyaṅgulāḥ, aṅgulaikoṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍaṅgalāsyā iti, vaśyākarṣaṇe yathā śilpinā ghaṭitā lokavyavahāreṇeti, stambhane kharvā vṛttocchrayeṇa tulyāḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulāścaturaṅgulagrīvāḥ ( vibhede ca )
analyzed: uccāṭane vidveṣe dīrgha grīvāḥ aṣṭa aṅgula vaktrāḥ kṛṣṇa aṅgāḥ vṛttena dvādaśa aṅgulāḥ ucchrayeṇa catu viśati aṅgulāḥ aṅgula eka oṣṭhāḥ ṣaṣ aṅga lāsyāḥ iti vaśyā
paṭale ślo

original: ] vajrācāryādisarva karmaprasarasādhanālakṣaṇ mahoddeśaḥ dūrvā śasyaṃ ca māṃsaṃ saviṣamapi tathā rājikā raktapuṣpaṃ vilvaṃ nirmālyamālāsukanakakusumānyeva pañcādikeṣu || 15 ||
analyzed: mahā uddeśaḥ dūrvā śasyam ca māṃsam sa viṣam api tathā rājikā rakta puṣpam vilvam nirmālya mālā su kanaka kusumāni eva pañca ādikeṣu

original: mohane unmattajāḥ stambhane vilvajā iti, arddhahastāḥ sarve dvādaśāṅgalāḥ
analyzed: mohane unmatta jāḥ stambhane vilva jāḥ iti arddha hastāḥ sarve dvādaśa aṅgalāḥ
kaniṣṭhā aṅgulī pramāṇena aṅguṣṭham yāvat

original: tadupari ūnādhikā na grāhyā iti samidhaniyamaḥ
analyzed: tad upari ūna adhikā na grāhyā iti samidha niyamaḥ
idānīm homa dravyāṇi ucyante kṣīra ityādi
iha śāntike go kṣīreṇa durvayāḥ homa

original: puṣṭī ghṛtena pañcaśasyaiḥ, māraṇe raktena māṃsaviṣābhyāṃ saha uccāṭane vidveṣe narabasayā ṣaḍaṅgulāsyāḥ sthūloṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha' dvayeneti kalaśaniyamaḥ
analyzed: puṣṭī ghṛtena pañcaśasyaiḥ māraṇe raktena māṃsa viṣābhyām saha uccāṭane vidveṣe nara basayā ṣaṣ aṅgula āsyāḥ sthūla uṣṭhāḥ aṅguṣṭha dvayena iti kalaśa niyamaḥ

original: sarvakarmaṇi śāntyādivaśyādi- karmaṇyuktā grāhyā iti niyamaḥ
analyzed: sarva karmaṇi śānti ādi vaśyā ādi karmaṇi uktāḥ grāhyāḥ iti niyamaḥ
idānīm śāntika ādi velā ucyate pūrvāhṇa ityādinā

original: iha pratidinaṃ pūrvāhnā- daṣṭayāmāḥ praharāḥ, teṣu pūrvāhna prahare caturthe uccāṭanam pañcame vaśyam, kuryāditi śāntikādipraharāḥ syuḥ
analyzed: iha pratidinam pūrvāhnā daṣṭa yāmāḥ praharāḥ teṣu pūrvāhna prahare caturthe uccāṭanam pañcame vaśyam kuryāt iti śāntika ādi praharāḥ syuḥ
evam tatra arddha yāmaiḥ iti pūrva āhlāda arddha prahare śāntikam
apara arddhe pauṣṭikam evam sarvatra api

original: tathā rātrau pūrvārddha prahare śāntikam, aparārddhe pauṣṭikamapi karmāṇi kuryānmantrīti
analyzed: tathā rātrau pūrva arddha prahare śāntikam apara arddhe pauṣṭikam api karmāṇi kuryāt mantrī iti

original: yadi vakṣyamāṇāsanaṃ baddhvā praharamekaṃ homaṃ kartuṃ na śaknoti, tadārddhapraharamekaṃ homaṃ kṛtvā sādhayedityubhayakathanam
analyzed: yadi vakṣyamāṇa āsanam baddhvā praharam ekam homam kartum na śaknoti tadā arddha praharam ekam homam kṛtvā sādhayet iti ubhaya kathanam

original: aparaḥ kālaviśeṣeṇa devī pūjā sādhana niyamaḥ pañcamapaṭale vakṣyamāṇe vaktavya iti || 13 ||
analyzed: aparaḥ kāla viśeṣeṇa devī pūjā sādhana niyamaḥ pañcama paṭale vakṣyamāṇe vaktavyaḥ iti

original: śāntikam, dvitīye pauṣṭikam, tṛtīye māraṇam, ṣaṣṭhe ākarṣaṇam, saptame mohanam, aṣṭame stambhanaṃ varjanīyaṃ idānīṃ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ krūravela lagnapratiṣedha ucyate- madhyāhnaṃ cārddharātraṃ dinaniśisamaye śāntike lagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maraṇabhayakaraṃ tadvadevaṃ prasiddham
analyzed: śāntikam dvitīye pauṣṭikam tṛtīye māraṇam ṣaṣṭhe ākarṣaṇam saptame mohanam aṣṭame stambhanam varjanīyam idānīm śānti puṣṭyoḥ lagna pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate madhyāhnam ca arddharātram

original: sakṣīrāḥ śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śaraśatasamidho māraṇe mānuṣāsthi- vidveṣe kākapicchāyari ca khadirajāḥ kiṃśukā kṛṣṭivaye || 14 |
analyzed: sa kṣīrāḥ śānti puṣṭyoḥ śara śata samidhaḥ māraṇe mānuṣa asthi vidveṣe kākapiccha ayari ca khadira jāḥ kiṃśukā

original: iha pratidine madhyāhnaṃ cārddharātraṃ ca śāntike puṣṭikārye'pi varjanīyam
analyzed: iha pratidine madhyāhnam ca arddharātram ca śāntike puṣṭi kārye varjanīyam

original: tathoditalagnaṃ krūragrahasthaṃ maṅgala śanikālāgnigrahasahitaṃ varjitam, yato maraṇabhayakaram
analyzed: tathā udita lagnam krūra graha stham maṅgala śani kālāgni graha sahitam varjitam yatas maraṇa bhaya karam

original: atha māraṇoccāṭane tu yojanīyaṃ tadeveti niyamaḥ
analyzed: atha māraṇa uccāṭane tu yojanīyam tat eva iti niyamaḥ
idānīm śāntika ādiṣu homa samidhaḥ ucyante sa kṣīra ityādinā

original: iha śāntī puṣṭī sakṣīrā samidhaḥ śaraśateti pañcaśatasaṃkhyāḥ, kṣīravṛkṣāṇāmiti udumbarāśvatthanyagrodha- parkaṭīmadhuvṛkṣāṇāmiti
analyzed: iha śāntī puṣṭī sa kṣīrā samidhaḥ śara śatā iti pañcaśata saṃkhyāḥ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām iti udumbara aśvattha nyagrodha parkaṭī madhuvṛkṣāṇām iti

original: māraṇe mānuṣāsthoni ghaṭitāni kaniṣṭhāṅgulīsaṃsthānānīti pañcaśatāni tathā vidveṣoccāṭane kākapicchāni pañcaśatāni evaṃ vaśye khabirajāḥ, ākṛṣṭau palāśajāḥ || 14||
analyzed: māraṇe mānuṣa āsthoni ghaṭitāni kaniṣṭhā aṅgulī saṃsthānāni iti pañcaśatāni tathā vidveṣa uccāṭane kākapicchāni pañcaśatāni evam vaśye khabira jāḥ ākṛṣṭau palāśa jāḥ

original: vilvonmattārdhahastāḥ śaraśatagaṇanā stambhane mohane ca kṣīrājyāsṛgvasāsvedakuliśasalila śleṣma madyādihome
analyzed: vilva unmatta ardha hastāḥ śara śata gaṇanā stambhane mohane ca kṣīra ājya asṛj vasā sveda kuliśa salila śleṣma madya ādi home

original: rājikālavaṇābhyāṃ saha vaśye svedena raktakaravīrādipuṣpaiḥ saha ākṛṣṭau mūtreṇa vilva- patreṇa tasya phalaśasyena vā saha, stambhane śleṣmaṇā nirmālyamālayā saha, mohane madyena dhuttūrakapuṣpe: saha, iti śāntikādyeṣu homadravyaniyamaḥ || 15 ||
analyzed: rājikā lavaṇābhyām saha vaśye svedena rakta karavīra ādi puṣpaiḥ saha ākṛṣṭau mūtreṇa vilva patreṇa tasya phala śasyena vā saha stambhane śleṣmaṇā nirmālya mālayā saha mohane madyena

original: yāmye nairṛtyakoṇe savaruṇapavane ācāryasyāsanaṃ ve bhavati narapate raṅgaṃ karmadvaye syādapi vibhakamale yakṣa rudrendravahnī śāntikarmādike ca
analyzed: yāmye nairṛtya koṇe sa varuṇa pavane ācāryasya āsanam bhavati narapate raṅgam karma dvaye syāt api vibha kamale yakṣa rudra indra vahnī śānti karma ādike ca

original: śveta kṛṣṇā kaṃpītaṃ śvetakṛṣṇākaṃpītaṃ bāhye buddhaprabhedaiḥ surayamavaruṇeṣūttare raṅgabhūmiḥ || 16 ||
analyzed: śveta kṛṣṇā kaṃpītam śveta kṛṣṇā kaṃpītam bāhye buddha prabhedaiḥ sura yama varuṇeṣu uttare raṅga bhūmiḥ

original: iha śāntau yāmye āsanaṃ kartavyam, vakṣyamāṇam, puṣṭau nairṛtyakoṇe, māraṇe varuṇe, uccāṭane vidveṣe vāyavye, vaśye yakṣe, ākṛṣṭāvīśāne, mohane pūrve, stambhane agnikoṇe iti homakuṇḍāsananiyamaḥ śāntikarmādike
analyzed: iha śāntau yāmye āsanam kartavyam vakṣyamāṇam puṣṭau nairṛtya koṇe māraṇe varuṇe uccāṭane vidveṣe vāyavye vaśye yakṣe ākṛṣṭau īśāne mohane pūrve stambhane agni koṇe iti

original: idānīṃ rajovidhirucyate - iha śāntikādī karmadvaye kuṇḍe vā maṇḍale vā madhye rajaḥ pāto bhavati
analyzed: idānīm rajaḥ vidhiḥ ucyate iha śāntika ādī karma dvaye kuṇḍe vā maṇḍale vā madhye rajaḥ pātaḥ bhavati

original: śāntipuṣṭyoḥ śvetaṃ rajaḥ, māraṇoccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rajaḥ, vaśyākṛṣṭau raktam, mohanastambhanayoḥ pītam, sarvakarmaṇi haritaṃ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo rakto vā pīto vā haritasahita iti
analyzed: śānti puṣṭyoḥ śvetam rajaḥ māraṇa uccāṭanayoḥ kṛṣṇam rajaḥ vaśyā ākṛṣṭau raktam mohana stambhanayoḥ pītam sarva karmaṇi haritam śvetaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ raktaḥ vā pītaḥ vā harita

original: evaṃ kuṇḍe vā maṇḍale vā bāhye pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime uttare buddhabhedena bhūmyāṃ rajaḥpātastantroktavidhinā bhagavato vā vaktra' varṇabhedeneti raṅga pātaniyamaḥ || 16 ||
analyzed: evam kuṇḍe vā maṇḍale vā bāhye pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime uttare buddha bhedena bhūmyām rajaḥ pātaḥ tantra ukta vidhinā bhagavataḥ vā pāta niyamaḥ

original: kuṇḍe vā raṅgabhūmirbhavati kulavaśād raṅgapātaśca bhūmi- nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśotsarjanaṃ devatānām
analyzed: kuṇḍe vā raṅga bhūmiḥ bhavati kula vaśāt raṅga pātaḥ ca nyāsa ādyam prokṣaṇa ādyam sva hṛdaya kuliśa utsarjanam devatānām

original: tathā vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa nyāsādyaṃ prokṣaṇādyaṃ svahṛdayakuliśenotsarjanaṃ devatā- nāmācāryeṇa kartavyamiti niyamaḥ
analyzed: tathā vakṣyamāṇa krameṇa nyāsa ādyam prokṣaṇa ādyam sva hṛdaya kuliśena utsarjanam devatā nāma ācāryeṇa kartavyam iti niyamaḥ

original: idānīmarghapātralakṣaṇamucyate- sphaṭikyādyaghaṃpātre vasudalakamalaṃ dvādaśāṅguṣṭhakaṃ ca daṇḍāgre'ñjatyapātraṃ bhavati ca culukaṃ cāhutī homakārye || 17||

iha śāntau sphaṭika pātram argha dāna artham śarāva ākṛtiḥ kacola ākṛti iti arthaḥ

evam sphaṭika ādi arghapātre vasu dala kamalam dvādaśa aṅguṣṭhakam ca iti

analyzed: iha daṇḍa agre hasta mātra daṇḍasya agre añjali ākāra pātram catur asram ca aṅgula eka ucchritam sama tale padmam padma patra agra mayam bāhye vajram madhya śuke chidram ghṛta dhārāyāḥ

original: ta[thā daṇḍāgre homakāyeṃ culukaṃ bhavati, ūrṇāsthānād hṛdayaṃ yāvat, mukhato vā tiryaga vibhāga iti tatraiva ṣaḍaṅa gulaṃ padmaṃ karatala māneneti dravyahoma'śravāyāṃ daṇḍa-pṛṣṭhe vajracihnamiti homapātra niyamaḥ || 17 ||

original: pañcākāro jinendrastrividhabhavagataḥ skandhadhātvādibhedaiḥ pañcākāraṃ hi tasmādapi bhavati rajomaṇḍale devatānām ||18||

original: vajrācāryādisarva karmaprasarasādhanālakṣaṇa mahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ sūtralakṣaṇamucyate— sūtraṃ hastāṣṭakaṃ syād bhavati karayavaikena vṛttaṃ trivṛttaṃ ācāryāṅguṣṭhakena trividhapathagataṃ sūtramekaṃ na cānyat

original: tadyathā-oṃ āḥ hū~ ho : uṣṇīṣa sumbhani sumbhavighnāntaka nīladaṇḍa prajñāntakaṭakkirājapadmāntakaacalayamāntaka- mahābalebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe, te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ vaṃ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śānti puṣṭi rakṣāvaraṇagupti kurvantu huṃ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā iti sarvakrodhabalimantraḥ
analyzed: tat yathā om āḥ hū ho uṣṇīṣa sumbhani sumbha vighna antaka nīladaṇḍa prajñāntaka ṭakki rāja padmāntaka acala yama antaka mahābalebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam balim gandham puṣpam dhūpam

original: tathā ākāśādikṛtsnasiddhānāṃ balimantrapadāni — oṃ āḥ hū~ ho : ākāśavāyuteja udakapṛthvī sādhitebhyaḥ saparivārebhyaḥ idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe
analyzed: tathā ākāśa ādi kṛtsna siddhānām bali mantra padāni om āḥ hū ho ākāśa vāyu tejaḥ udaka pṛthvī sādhitebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam balim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe

original: teṃ cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu jaḥ hū~ vaṃ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śānti puṣṭi rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu huṃ hūṃ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: ca āgatya sa parivārāḥ śīghram idam balim gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu jaḥ hū vaṃ ho saṃtṛptāḥ sarva sattvānām śānti puṣṭi rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kurvantu hum phaṭ vajradharaḥ ājñāpayati

original: tato dikpālānāṃ balimantrapadāni - oṃ ā : hū~ ho : brahmaviṣṇu- nairṛtyavāyuyamāgnisamudreśvarendrayakṣebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe, te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ vaṃ hoḥ saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śānti puṣṭi rakṣāvaraṇa guptiṃ kurvantu huṃ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas dikpālānām bali mantra padāni om ā hū ho brahma viṣṇu nairṛtya vāyu yama agni samudra īśvara indra yakṣebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam balim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe te

original: tato graha balimantrapadāni – oṃ āḥ hū~ ho rāhukālāgnicandrasūrya budhamaṅgalaśukra bṛhaspatiketuśanibhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe, te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu jaḥ hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarva- sattvānāṃ śānti puṣṭi rakṣāvaraṇa guptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas graha bali mantra padāni om āḥ hū ho rāhu kālāgni candra sūrya budha maṅgala śukra bṛhaspati ketu śanibhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam balim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam dadāmahe te

original: tato nāgabalimantrapadāni - oṃ āḥ hū~ ho: jayavijayapadmakarkoṭakavāsukiśaṅkhapālakuli- kānantatakṣakamahāpadmebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe, te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ baliṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarva- sattvānāṃ śānti puṣṭi rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas nāga bali mantra padāni om āḥ hū ho jaya vijaya padma karkoṭaka vāsuki śaṅkhapāla kuli ka ananta takṣaka mahāpadmebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam balim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam akṣatam

original: tato bhūtabalimantrapadāni - oṃ āḥ haiṃ hoḥ vetāḍavikṛta mukhaśva kākaśūkaragṛdhravyāghrolūka- jambūkagaruḍamukhebhyaḥ saparivārebhya idaṃ baliṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ dīpam akṣataṃ dadāmahe, te cāgatya saparivārāḥ śīghramidaṃ gṛhṇantu khādantu pibantu ja: hū~ va~ ho: saṃtṛptāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ śānti puṣṭi rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kurvantu hu~ hū~ phaṭ vajradhara ājñāpayati svāhā
analyzed: tatas bhūta bali mantra padāni om āḥ hoḥ vetāḍa vikṛta mukha śva kāka śūkara gṛdhra vyāghra ulūka jambūka garuḍa mukhebhyaḥ sa parivārebhyaḥ idam balim gandham puṣpam dhūpam dīpam
iti bhūta bali mantraḥ

original: ye buddhāḥ sarvadikṣu vyapagatakaluṣā bodhisattvā sabhāryāsta māṃ vai pālayantu paramakaruṇayā maṇḍale sekahetoḥ

original: idānīṃ śiṣyarakṣāvidhirucyate- abhiṣeka- kṛtvā śiṣyasya rakṣāṃ śirasi hṛdi tathoṣṇīṣanābhau ca kaṇṭhe śrīguhyānje jinādyairubhayakulagataiḥ kāyavākcittavaḥ

original: evaṃ lepā (khā ) dikānāṃ prakaṭitaniyataiḥ śrīsvaraiḥ pustakānāṃ sattvānāṃ mokṣahetoramukamapi vibho maṇḍalaṃ lekhayāmi || 31 ||

analyzed: idānīm saṃkṣepataḥ ucyate śuddhe sthāne su pūrṇe su sama viracite kūrma pṛṣṭha unnate ca hasta māne su nṛpa yuga sāhastram eva pramāṇe

original: sūtraṃ vajraṃ rajo vai surayamavaruṇe cottare vajraghaṇṭāṃ dattvā labdhe nimitte prathamaparadinaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sūtraṇīyam ||32||

original: tatra mantrapadāni – oṃ āṃ īṃṝ ḹ vajra- sūtra sarvadharmaikasvabhāva sarvadharmān ekākārasvabhāvān kuru kuru svāhā

original: tatra mantrapadāni - oṃ hū~ krodhavajra sarvasattvakaruṇātmaka sarvadharmaikasukhasvabhāva sarvadharmān vajrasukhasvabhāvān kuru kuru svāhā
analyzed: tatra mantra padāni om hū krodha vajra sarva sattva karuṇā ātmaka sarva dharma eka sukha svabhāva sarva dharmān vajra sukha svabhāvān kuru kuru svāhā

analyzed: gandha ādikam dattvā dakṣiṇe niveśayet iti vajra adhivāsanā na vidhiḥ

original: tatra mantrapadāni oṃ ho va jjraghaṇṭe sarvadharmaika prajñādhvanisvabhāve sarvākāra sarvadharmaprabodhani sarvadharmānniḥsvabhāvān prabodhaya prabodhaya svāhā
analyzed: tatra mantra padāni om ho va jjraghaṇṭe sarva dharma eka prajñā dhvani svabhāve sarva ākāra sarva dharma prabodhani sarva dharmān niḥsvabhāvān prabodhaya prabodhaya svāhā

original: gandhādikaṃ dattvā uttarabhūbhyāṃ niveśayediti vajraghaṇṭādhivāsana vidhiḥ iti bhūmyādisaṃgraha vidhiḥ

original: ādī maṇḍalādhyeṣaṇakāle, madhye bhūmyādisaṃgrahe, ante maṇḍalapraveśakāle ca sarvatra maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā dantakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā tato rakṣāṃ karoti

original: tatraiṣa vidhiḥ- snātasya dhītavastrasya śāntyādikarmānurūpeṇa tasyāmeva bhūmyāṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā udumbaraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ dvādaśāṅgulamanyakṣīravṛkṣajaṃ vā śirasi puṣpamālābandhaṃ gandhādibhi- racayitvā pūrvābhimukhasya deyamanena mantreṇa – oṃ āḥ hū~ ho: haṃ kṣaḥ vajradantakāṣṭha catuvimokṣa mukhaviśuddhasvabhāva kāyavākcittajñānamukha 'dantādimalaṃ viśodhaya viśodhaya svāhā
analyzed: tatra eṣa vidhiḥ snātasya dhīta vastrasya śānti ādi karma anurūpeṇa tasyām eva bhūmyām maṇḍalam kṛtvā udumbaram dantakāṣṭham dvādaśa aṅgulam anya kṣīravṛkṣa jam vā śirasi puṣpa mālā

original: iti dantakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā antyādhivāsane ūrdhvataḥ prakṣiptaṃ maṇḍale patitaṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ lakṣayet
analyzed: iti dantakāṣṭham dattvā antya adhivāsane ūrdhvatas prakṣiptam maṇḍale patitam dantakāṣṭham lakṣayet

original: yatra patati yena śirasā tatrasthaṃ karmaprasarādikaṃ tasya siddhayati
analyzed: yatra patati yena śirasā tatrastham karma prasara ādikam tasya
iti dantakāṣṭha vidhiḥ

original: 14 tato maṇḍalabhūmyāṃ śiṣyaṃ praveśya śirasi kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhau uṣṇīṣe guhye oṃ āḥ hū~ ho : haṃ kṣaḥ ṣaṭkulairnyāsaṃ kṛtvā vajrasattvaṃ pracodayed ebhirmantrapadeḥ - oṃ a ā aṃ aḥ vajrasattva mahāsukhavastra kālacakra śiṣyasyābhimukho bhava santuṣṭo bhava varado bhava kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānaṃ kuru kuru svāhā

iti śiṣya adhivāsana vidhiḥ

original: tataḥ śiṣyaṃ visarjayitvā maṇḍalamadhye vijayakalaśam, pūrve vajrasūtram, paścime vajrarajobhāṇḍāni, dakṣiṇe vajram, uttare ghaṇṭāṃ dvāravibhāġa jñātvā dadātyācāryaḥ

original: tatastān pañcasthāneṣu dattvā dakṣiṇe śubhāśubhanimittārthaṃ śayyādhivāsanaṃ karotyanena mantreṇa - oṃ hoḥ vajrakamaladalagarbhe śayye vajrasukhamahānidrāṃ karomi yathā tathāgatena kṛ tā haḥ haḥ svāhā
analyzed: tatas tān pañca sthāneṣu dattvā dakṣiṇe śubha aśubha nimitta artham śayyā adhivāsanam karoti anena mantreṇa om hoḥ vajra kamala dala garbhe śayye vajra sukha mahā nidrām karomi yathā
iti śayyā adhivāsanam

original: oṃ vaṃ evaṃ padmavajracihnau prajñopāyau maṇḍalādhipatī vajra' sukhajñānāṅgaṃ mama dadatāṃ haṃ haḥ hū~ phaṭ
analyzed: om vaṃ evam padma vajracihnau prajñā upāyau maṇḍala adhipatī vajra sukha jñāna aṅgam mama dadatām haṃ haḥ hū phaṭ

original: ityadhyeṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā tato'bhiṣiktaṃ saptābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bhāvaye - diti
analyzed: iti adhyeṣaṇām kṛtvā tatas bhiṣiktam sapta abhiṣekaiḥ ātmānam bhāvaye iti

om prāptaḥ ham iti sapta abhiṣeka anujñā vidhiḥ

original: tato mantrī kalaśādikamuttarābhiṣekaṃ prārthayedebhirmantrapadaiḥ – oṃ oṃ prajñopāyau kala- śābhiṣekaṃ me dadatāṃ hu~ hū~ phaṭ
analyzed: tatas mantrī kalaśa ādikam uttara abhiṣekam prārthayet ebhiḥ mantra padaiḥ om om prajñā upāyau kala śa abhiṣekam me dadatām hu hū phaṭ

original: oṃ āḥ prajñopāyo guhyābhiṣekaṃ me dadatāṃ hu~ hūṃ phaṭ

analyzed: om hum prajñā upāyau vajra sattva viśvamātarau prajñā jñāna abhiṣekam me dadatām hum phaṭ
iti adhyeṣya tatas ātmānam vakṣyamāṇa vidhinā abhiṣiktam bhāvayet
tatas haṅkāram āvahet

original: oṃ oṃ vajrasattvena vajrakalaśābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto vajrasattvaputro'calā bhūmibdho'hamiti
analyzed: om om vajra sattvena vajra kalaśa abhiṣekeṇa abhiṣiktaḥ calā bhūmibdhaḥ ham iti

original: oṃ āḥ va - jrasatvena guhyābhiṣeke'bhiṣikto vajrasattvayuvarājo navabhūmilabdho'ham
analyzed: om āḥ va jra sattvena guhya abhiṣeke bhiṣiktaḥ vajra sattva yuvarājaḥ nava bhūmi labdhaḥ ham

original: oṃ huṃ vajrasattvena prajñā jñānenābhiṣikto dvitīyavajradharo'haṃ dharmameghābhūmilabdho'hamityahaṅkāraṃ kuryādityutta- rābhiṣekavidhiḥ
analyzed: om hum vajra sattvena prajñā jñānena abhiṣiktaḥ dvitīya vajradharaḥ haṃ dharmameghā bhūmi labdhaḥ haṃ iti ahaṅkāram kuryāt iti uttara abhiṣeka vidhiḥ

original: tata uttarāduttaraṃ caturthābhiṣekamupadeśataḥ prārthavedanena mantreṇa - oṃ ho prajñopāyātmaka vajrasattva mahā mudrājñānābhiṣekaṃ me prayaccha oṃ ā: hūṃ ho phaṭ
analyzed: tatas uttarāt uttaram caturtha abhiṣekam upadeśataḥ prārtha vedanena mantreṇa om ho prajñā upāya ātmaka vajra sattva mahā mudrā jñāna abhiṣekam me prayaccha om ā hūm ho phaṭ
atas dhyeṣya ātmānam vaimalyena abhiṣiktam bhāvayet

original: āsāmāsanāni kumbhīracarma, kapardaka puñjam, karkaṭāsthipuñjam, śuṣka matsyam, makaracarma, darda racarma, kūrmakaroṭakam, śaṅkha iti yathā- saṃkhyam |

original: karṇodhvaṃ muṣṭibandho varaśaramudrāyām aṅguṣṭhaṃ madhyamodhvaṃ tarjanyādha iti śaramudrā aṅkaśe vajramuṣṭibandhastarjanī muṣṭayuvaṃ maṅkuśākārā 'vakrā'tyantamitya - ṅkuśamudrā
analyzed: muṣṭibandhaḥ vara śara mudrāyām aṅguṣṭham madhyamā ūdhvam tarjanyā adhas iti śara mudrā aṅkaśe vajra muṣṭibandhaḥ tarjanī muṣṭa yuvam maṅkuśa ākārā vakrā tyantam iti aṅkuśa mudrā

original: tathā kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ muṣṭistarjanī, anāme'dhaḥ śarasamāśliṣṭe, tayorupari madhyamā kunte, evaṃ kuntamudrā
analyzed: tathā kaniṣṭhā aṅguṣṭhābhyām muṣṭiḥ tarjanī anāme śara samāśliṣṭe tayoḥ upari madhyamā kunte evam kunta mudrā

original: tathā tiryaṅmuṣṭiśca bāhuprasārā' daṇḍe, 'evaṃ daṇḍamudrā bhavati
analyzed: tathā tiryak muṣṭiḥ ca bāhu prasārā daṇḍe evam daṇḍamudrā bhavati

original: tathā susamakaratale ūrdhvamaṅguṣṭhaprasārastiryagvibhāgena tarjanyādyāścatasraḥ śliṣṭāḥ, evaṃ kuṭhāramudrā bhavati || 178 ||
analyzed: tathā su sama kara tale ūrdhvam aṅguṣṭha prasāraḥ tiryak vibhāgena tarjanī ādyāḥ catasraḥ śliṣṭāḥ evam kuṭhāramudrā bhavati

original: ūrdhve muṣṭidvayaṃ syādasurapatigajasyājine tarjanī ca daṃṣṭrāyāṃ muṣṭibandho hyabhayakaratale cārdhacandrā kaniṣṭhā
analyzed: ūrdhve muṣṭi dvayam syāt asurapati gajasya ajine tarjanī ca daṃṣṭrāyām muṣṭibandhaḥ hi abhayakara tale ca ardhacandrā kaniṣṭhā

original: vāme bāhuprasāro bhavati karatalaṃ cordhvagaṃ kheṭake ca khaṭvāṅge'cchidramuṣṭirbhavati ca niyatā skandhasārā kaniṣṭhā || 179 ||
analyzed: vāme bāhu prasāraḥ bhavati kara talam ca ūrdhva gam kheṭake ca khaṭvāṅge chidra muṣṭiḥ bhavati ca niyatā skandha sārā kaniṣṭhā

original: tathā ūrdhva muṣṭidvayaṃ syāt asurapatigajo vināyakaḥ, tasya carmamudrāyāmūrdhva tarjanī muṣṭidvaye'pīti gajacarmamudrā
analyzed: tathā ūrdhva muṣṭi dvayam syāt asurapati gajaḥ vināyakaḥ tasya carmamudrāyām ūrdhva tarjanī muṣṭi dvaye gajacarmamudrā

original: tathā daṃṣṭrāyāṃ muṣṭibandho bhayahaghukarata le'rdhacandrākāre kaniṣṭhe savyāvasavyamukhe darśayet
analyzed: tathā daṃṣṭrāyām muṣṭi bandhaḥ le ūrdhva candra ākāre kaniṣṭhe savya avasavya mukhe darśayet
evam daṃṣṭrā mudrā iti dakṣiṇa hasta cihna mudrā gaja carma daṃṣṭrā mudrā niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ vāmahastacihnamudrocyate - iha vāme bāhuprasāro bhavati karatalamūrdhva- mabhayakaratalavat kheṭake phalake, evaṃ phalakamudrā
analyzed: idānīm vāma hasta cihna mudrā ucyate iha vāme bāhu prasāraḥ bhavati kara talam ūrdhvam abhaya kara tala vat kheṭake phalake evam phalaka mudrā

original: tathā khaṭvāṅge'chidra muṣṭistarjanī- madhyamā'nāmāṅguṣṭhāḥ śliṣṭāḥ skandhasthāne kaniṣṭhovaṃ prasāritā evaṃ khaṭvāṅga- mudreti || 179 ||
analyzed: tathā khaṭvāṅga muṣṭiḥ tarjanī madhyamā nāma aṅguṣṭhāḥ śliṣṭāḥ skandha sthāne prasāritāḥ evam khaṭvāṅga mudrā iti

original: ] mudrādṛṣṭimaṇḍala visarjanavīra bhojya vidhimahoddeśaḥ pāṇī pṛṣṭhe'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ bandhanaṃ kaṇṭhikāyāṃ tryaṅgulyanyonyayogobhayakarakuṭilādyantayormekhalāyām || 182 ||
analyzed: mudrā dṛṣṭi maṇḍala visarjana vīra bhojya vidhi mahā uddeśaḥ pāṇī pṛṣṭhe ṅgulīnām krama pariracitam bandhanam kaṇṭhikāyām tri aṅguli anyonya yoga ubhaya kara kuṭila ādi antayoḥ

original: tathā hastābhyāṃ śaṅkhamudrā śliṣṭā mukuṭe bhavati ityūrdhva tarjanīdvandvayogaḥ
analyzed: tathā hastābhyām śaṅkha mudrā śliṣṭā mukuṭe bhavati tarjanī dvandva yogaḥ

original: ubhayahastayo viṣama karataladeśaḥ pañcāṅgulīnāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuṇḍaleṣviti kuṇḍalamudrā tathā pāṇau pṛṣṭhe'ṅgulīnāṃ kramapariracitaṃ parasparaṃ bandhanaṃ kaṇṭhikāyāmevaṃ kaṇṭhikā mudrā
analyzed: ubhaya hastayaḥ kara tala deśaḥ pañca aṅgulīnām pṛṣṭhatas kuṇḍaleṣu iti kuṇḍala mudrā tathā pāṇau pṛṣṭhe ṅgulīnām krama pariracitam parasparam bandhanam kaṇṭhikāyām evam kaṇṭhikā

original: tathā mekhalāyāṃ vyaṅgulyo'nāmāmadhyamātarjanyo vāmasavyayoraṅgalyagre melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhā- ṅguṣṭhāyā muṣṭibandha iti mekhalāmudrā || 182 ||
analyzed: tathā mekhalāyām vyaṅgulyaḥ nāma amadhyamā tarjanyaḥ vāma savyayoḥ aṅgalī agre melāpakaḥ kaniṣṭhā ṅguṣṭhāyāḥ muṣṭibandhaḥ iti mekhalāmudrā

original: aṅguṣṭho madhyame dve valayamiva kṛtī nūpure muṣṭibandhāt tadvat keyūrayugme bhavati ca kaṭake tarjanīdvandvayogaḥ
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhaḥ madhyame dve valayam iva kṛtī nūpure muṣṭibandhāt tadvat keyūra yugme bhavati ca kaṭake tarjanī dvandva yogaḥ

original: aṅguṣṭho ḍākinīnāṃ bhavati varakulaṃ tarjanī guhyakānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ phaṇīnāṃ kramapariracitā madhyamānāmikā vā || 183||
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhaḥ ḍākinīnām bhavati varakulam tarjanī guhyakānām gandharvāṇām phaṇīnām krama pariracitā madhyamā anāmikā vā

original: tathobhayahastayoraṅguṣṭhe dve madhyame dve śliṣṭe tābhyāṃ valayamiva kṛtau nūpure śeṣā- ṅgulībhirmuṣṭibandha ' iti nūpuramudrā
analyzed: tathā ubhaya hastayoḥ aṅguṣṭhe dve madhyame dve śliṣṭe tābhyām valayam iva kṛtau nūpure śeṣā ṅgulībhiḥ muṣṭibandhaḥ iti nūpura mudrā

original: tathā keyūre kaṭake vā'ṅguṣṭhayogastarjanoyogo valaya iva bhavatīti bhagavataścihnamudrā

original: tathā pañcāṅgulyo'praparvavakrā darśitā phaṇināṃ jātimudrā bhavati

original: tathā jvālāmudrāyāṃ madhyamānāmākaniṣṭhā prasāritā ubhayakare tarjanyau dve'nyonyaṃ granthite śirasa uparyadho' mukhenāṅgaṣṭhau śliṣṭāviti varakaratalayo- stenaiva prakāreṇa, kintu tarjanī 'sāritā'nyā dvitīyā jvālāmudreti jātimudrā tiryaṅmukhīnāṃ darśanīyeti niyamaḥ || 185 ||

original: idānīṃ vīravīreśvarīṇāṃ parasparasaṃbhāṣaṇamudrā ucyante - tarjanyā darśanaṃ ve kathitamapi bhavet svāgataṃ yoginaśca dvābhyāṃ susvāgataṃ ca pravadati subhagā kṣemamaṅguṣṭhabandhāt

original: mitraṃ me saumyadṛṣṭyā prakaṭayati bhayaṃ krodhadṛṣṭyā bhṛkuṭayā krūrā'haṃ keśadṛṣṭyā kathayati subhagasyeṅgiteḥ svasvabhāvam |
analyzed: mitram me saumya dṛṣṭyā prakaṭayati bhayam krodha dṛṣṭyā bhṛkuṭayā krūrā ham keśa dṛṣṭyā kathayati subhagasya iṅgiteḥ sva svabhāvam

original: ūrṇādṛṣṭayottamāhaṃ prakaṭayati guṇaṃ yoginī ghrāṇadṛṣṭyā saubhāgyaṃ coṣṭhadṛṣṭyā vadati kucayugālokane'haṃ sumudrā || 195 ||
analyzed: ūrṇā dṛṣṭayā uttamā aham prakaṭayati guṇam yoginī ghrāṇa dṛṣṭyā saubhāgyam ca uṣṭha dṛṣṭyā vadati kuca yuga ālokane haṃ sumudrā
paṭale balo

original: mudrādṛṣṭimaṇḍala visarjanavī ra bhojya vidhimahoddeśaḥ - mitraṃ me tvaṃ saumyadṛṣṭyā kathayatīti saṃbhāṣaṇadṛṣṭiniyamaḥ |
analyzed: mudrā dṛṣṭi maṇḍala bhojya vidhi mahā uddeśaḥ mitram me tvam saumya dṛṣṭyā kathayati iti saṃbhāṣaṇa dṛṣṭi niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ bhayadṛṣṭaya ucyante – iha yadā bhṛkuṭīṃ kṛtvā krodhadṛṣṭi darśayati tadā tayā krodhadṛṣṭyā bhṛkuṭadhā yogino bhayaṃ prakaṭayati, ajñatvāditi |
analyzed: idānīm bhaya dṛṣṭayaḥ ucyante iha yadā bhṛkuṭīm kṛtvā krodha dṛṣṭi darśayati tadā tayā krodha dṛṣṭyā bhṛkuṭadhā yoginaḥ bhayam prakaṭayati ajña tvāt iti

original: tathā keśadṛṣṭyā krūrā'hamiti kathayati subhagasya yoginaḥ svasvabhāvamebhiriṅgitairiti |
analyzed: tathā keśa dṛṣṭyā krūrā ham iti kathayati subhagasya yoginaḥ sva svabhāvam ebhiḥ iṅgitaiḥ iti
tathā ūrṇā dṛṣṭayā uttamā aham iti prakaṭayati
tathā guṇam prakaṭayati ghrāṇa dṛṣṭayā
oṣṭha dṛṣṭyā saubhāgyam svakīyam prakaṭayati
tathā sva kuca yuga ālokane haṃ sumudrā iti vadati

original: hṛddṛṣṭyā bhāvitātmā vadati bhujayugālokane'haṃ pracaṇḍā śaktāhaṃ skandhadṛṣṭyā sanakhakaratalālokane rākṣasī ca |
analyzed: hṛd dṛṣṭyā bhāvita ātmā vadati bhuja yuga ālokane haṃ pracaṇḍā śaktā aham skandha dṛṣṭyā sa nakha kara tala ālokane rākṣasī ca

original: pṛṣṭhālo ke bhujaṅgī tvahamiti samayī nābhidṛṣṭayā narendra śuddhāhaṃ guhyadṛṣṭyā'pyahamapi surate durjayā corudṛṣṭyā ||196||
analyzed: ke bhujaṅgī tu aham iti samayī nābhi dṛṣṭayā narendra śuddhā aham guhya dṛṣṭyā pi aham api surate durjayā ca ūru dṛṣṭyā
hṛd dṛṣṭayā bhāvitātmā iti vadati
tathā bhuja yuga ālokane haṃ pracaṇḍā iti vadati
tathā skandha dṛṣṭyā śaktā aham iti vadati
tathā sa nakha kara tala ālokane rākṣasī cām iti vadati
tathā pṛṣṭha āloke nāgini aham iti vadati
tathā na abhidṛṣṭacā ham samayinī iti vadati
narendra iti āmantraṇam
tathā guhya dṛṣṭayā śuddhā aham iti vadati
tathā ūru dṛṣṭaghā surate durjayā aham iti kathayati

original: siddhāhaṃ jānudṛṣṭyā kathayati niyataṃ caddhidā pādadṛṣṭyā pādāṅguṣṭhāvaloke tvahamapi bhuvane vajrakāyaikavīrā, sarvāṅgulyagradṛṣṭyā tribhuvananilaye sarvagā viśvamātā dūtīnāmeva dṛṣṭi: kṣititalanilaye yoginā veditavyā || 197||
analyzed: siddhā aham jānu dṛṣṭyā kathayati niyatam pāda dṛṣṭyā pādāṅguṣṭha avaloke tu aham api bhuvane vajra kāya ekavīrā sarva aṅguli agra dṛṣṭyā tribhuvana nilaye sarvagā viśva mātā
tathā jānu dṛṣṭacā siddhā ham iti kathayati
tathā pāda dṛṣṭacā ham ṛddhi dā iti kathayati

original: tathā pādāṅguṣṭhāvaloke kṛte sati tayā dṛṣṭyāpyahaṃ bhuvane vajrakāyaikavīreti kathayati |
analyzed: tathā pādāṅguṣṭha avaloke kṛte sati tayā dṛṣṭyā api aham bhuvane vajra kāya eka vīra iti kathayati
tathā sarva aṅgulya pradṛṣṭyā pādayoḥ tribhuvana nilaye sarvagā viśva mātā ham iti kathayati
evam yogī api sāmarthya yuktam ātma guṇān dūtīnām prakaṭayati

original: evamuktakrameṇa tīnāmeva dṛṣṭiḥ punarapi bahuvidhā veditavyā svabhāvairiti dṛṣṭisaṃketa niyamaḥ |
analyzed: evam ukta krameṇa tīnām eva dṛṣṭiḥ punar api bahuvidhā veditavyā svabhāvaiḥ iti dṛṣṭi saṃketa niyamaḥ
tathā chomakāḥ

original: yasya bhāvasya yannāma tasyādyākṣareṇa tadgrahaṇaṃ veditavyam, prastāva - vaśāditi |
analyzed: yasya bhāvasya yat nāma tasya ādya akṣareṇa tad grahaṇam veditavyam prastāva vaśāt iti

original: yathā saindhavamānayetyukte snāne vastram, bhojane lavaṇam, gamane'śvaḥ, yuddhe vimalaprabhāyāṃ khaḍgamiti nyāyena 'sarvaḥ prathamākṣara saṃketavastudharmo veditavyaḥ |
analyzed: yathā saindhavam ānaya iti ukte snāne vastram bhojane lavaṇam gamane śvas yuddhe vimalaprabhāyām khaḍgam iti nyāyena sarvaḥ prathama akṣara saṃketa vastu dharmaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: gaṇacakrādike'samaya- sattvamadhye sandhyābhāṣāntareṇa chomakena vā vaktavyaṃ yoginā yoginyā vā iti sarvatra niyamaḥ || 197 ||
analyzed: gaṇa cakra ādike sattva madhye sandhyā bhāṣā antareṇa chomakena vā vaktavyam yoginā yoginyā vā iti sarvatra niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ dānārtha svaśarīrādivibhāganiyama ucyate-- ṣaḍbhāgaṃ dehamadhye karacaraṇatanordānamapyuttamāṅga vācā karmendriyāṇāṃ saguṇamapi manastvindriyāṇāṃ ca madhye |
analyzed: idānīm śiṣyāṇām dāna artha sva śarīra ādi vibhāga niyamaḥ ucyate ṣaḍbhāgam deha madhye kara caraṇa tanoḥ dānam api uttamāṅga vācā karmendriyāṇām sa guṇam api manaḥ tu indriyāṇām ca

original: dhātvaṃśaṃ dhātumadhye dvipadapaśugaṇān tattvabhāgena cānyad ācāryāya pradāya vrajati sukhapadaṃ divyamudrānuviddhaḥ || 198 ||
analyzed: dhātu aṃśam dhātu madhye dvipada paśu gaṇān tattva bhāgena ca anyat ācāryāya pradāya vrajati sukha padam divya mudrā anuviddhaḥ
ṣaṣ bhāgam ityādinā

original: iha yadā vajrācāryeṇābhiṣikto gṛhastha 'ścellako bhikṣuko vā, teneyaṃ pratijñā kartavyā mayā sarvakālaṃ 'ṣaḍaṃśaṃ sarvavaratūnāṃ dānaṃ dātavyamiti |
analyzed: iha yadā vajra ācāryeṇa abhiṣiktaḥ gṛhasthaḥ ścellakaḥ bhikṣukaḥ vā tena iyam pratijñā kartavyā mayā sarvakālam ṣaṣ aṃśam sarva varatūnām dānam dātavyam iti

original: tatra prathamaṃ tāvat ṣaḍbhāgaṃ dehamadhye karacaraṇatanoriti hastadvayasya caraṇadvayasya tanoreṣu pañcasu madhye ṣaṣṭhamuttamāṅgadānaṃ namaskārārtham ācāryāya pradeyaṃ buddhabodhisattvāya gurave |
analyzed: tatra prathamam tāvat ṣaḍbhāgam deha madhye kara caraṇa tanoḥ iti hasta dvayasya caraṇa dvayasya tanoḥ eṣu pañcasu madhye ṣaṣṭham uttamāṅga dānam namaskāra artham ācāryāya pradeyam buddha

original: taṃ dattvā vrajati sukhapadaṃ divyamudrānuviddho dānadāteti | tathā vācā karmendriyāṇāṃ madhye deyā pāṇipādapāyubhagādīndriyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vāgindriyaṃ satyavacanārthaṃ vācā deyeti bhagavato niyamaḥ |
analyzed: tam dattvā vrajati sukha padam divya mudrā anuviddhaḥ dāna dātā iti tathā vācā karmendriyāṇām madhye deyā pāṇi pāda pāyu bhaga ādi indriyāṇām ṣaṣṭham vāc indriyam satya vacana artham

original: tathā cakṣuḥ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyendriyāṇāṃ madhye ṣaṣṭhaṃ manaḥ saguṇaṃ māyāprapañcarahitaṃ sattvārthaṃ deyamiti dānaniyamaḥ |
analyzed: tathā cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya indriyāṇām madhye ṣaṣṭham manaḥ sa guṇam māyā prapañca rahitam sattva artham deyam iti dāna niyamaḥ
tathā dhātu aṃśam iti

original: cirāgantukadhātūnāṃ ṣaḍaṃśaṃ deyaṃ catuṣpadāni ṣaḍaṃśena deyāni dhātavaḥ svarṇaratnadhānyādyacetanāni dravyāṇi teṣāṃ yoginyādipūjārthamiti |
analyzed: cira āgantuka dhātūnām ṣaṣ aṃśam deyam catuṣpadāni ṣaṣ aṃśena deyāni dhātavaḥ svarṇa ratna dhānya ādi acetanāni dravyāṇi teṣām yoginī ādi pūjā artham iti

original: tathā sacetanāni dvipada- pañcāṃśānyātma kuṭumba bhogāya sthāpayitavyāni |
analyzed: tathā sa cetanāni dvipada pañcāṃśāni ātma kuṭumba bhogāya sthāpayitavyāni

original: tathā tatsvabhāgena cānyad rūpabhāryādikaṃ māsamadhye pañcavārān kāmadānena deyamiti tathāgata- niyamaḥ |
analyzed: tathā tad svabhāgena ca anyat rūpa bhāryā ādikam māsa madhye pañca vārān kāma dānena deyam iti tathāgata niyamaḥ

original: anyathā mantranaye kāma dānena vinā'nantakalpairmahāmudrāsiddhirna bhavati |
analyzed: anyathā mantra naye kāma dānena vinā nanta kalpaiḥ mahāmudrā siddhiḥ na bhavati

original: karmamudrājñānamudrāsiddhirapi na bhavati, rāgābhibhūtasya kula grahāditi |
analyzed: karmamudrā jñāna mudrā siddhiḥ api na bhavati rāga abhibhūtasya grahāt iti
evam ṣaṣ vibhāga dāna niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ karuṇābhiṣeka ucyate- ye satvā lokadhātau trividhabhavagatā jñānavajrāṅkuśena ākṛṣṭvā tān samantāt paramakaruṇayā maṇḍale cābhiṣicya |
analyzed: idānīm karuṇā abhiṣekaḥ ucyate ye satvāḥ lokadhātau trividha bhava gatāḥ jñāna vajra aṅkuśena ākṛṣṭvā tān samantāt parama karuṇayā maṇḍale ca abhiṣicya
na asti
ṣaṣ aṅgam
ṣaṣ aṅgam
iti adhikam

original: budderva jāmṛtenāmalaśaśivapuṣā vajriṇo labdhamārgāḥ svasthāne preṣaṇīyā vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhāḥ || 199 ||
analyzed: buddeḥ va ja amṛtena amala śaśi vapuṣā vajriṇaḥ labdha mārgāḥ sva sthāne preṣaṇīyāḥ vyapagata kaluṣāḥ bodhi caryā anurūḍhāḥ
ye sattvāḥ ityādinā

original: iha lokaghātau ṣaḍgatiṣu ye sattvā' anabhiṣiktā- strividha' bhavagatāstān sarvajñajñānavajñāṅkuśenākṛṣya bhāvanāmātrāt paramakaruṇayā maṇḍale cābhiṣicya buddhaviṇmūtraraktamajjābhiḥ tathā vajrāmṛtena śukreṇāmalaśaśivapuṣā tato vajriṇo labdhamārgāḥ santa iti vibhāvya tataste svasthāne preṣaṇīyā vajrācāryeṇa sarve vyapagatakaluṣā bodhicaryānurūḍhā iti karuṇābhiṣekaniyamaḥ || 199 ||
analyzed: iha lokaghātau ṣaṣ gatiṣu ye sattvāḥ anabhiṣiktāḥ bhava gatāḥ tān sarvajña jñāna vajñāṅkuśena ākṛṣya bhāvanā mātrāt parama karuṇayā maṇḍale ca abhiṣicya buddha viṣ mūtra rakta

original: idānīmavadhūtasya śiṣyasyābhiṣeka niyama ucyate- dravyābhāve'bhiṣeko jinapativacanenāvadhūtasya deya evaṃ dhūmādimārgaḥ sakalaguṇa nidhirnāḍikā yogayuktaḥ |
analyzed: idānīm avadhūtasya śiṣyasya abhiṣeka niyamaḥ ucyate dravya abhāve bhiṣekaḥ jinapati vacanena avadhūtasya deyaḥ evam dhūma ādi mārgaḥ sakala guṇa nidhiḥ nāḍikā yoga yuktaḥ

original: sevārthaṃ hastamudrā svahṛdayavaśagā sarvadoṣairvimuktā anyeṣāṃ neva deyaṃ jinavarahṛdayaṃ mātṛpujāvihīnam || 200||
analyzed: sevā artham hasta mudrā sva hṛdaya vaśagā sarva doṣaiḥ vimuktā anyeṣām na iva deyam jinavara hṛdayam mātṛ pujā vihīnam
dravya abhāve ityādinā

original: iha yadāvadhūtasya śiṣyasya dravyābhāvastadā guruṇā dravyābhāve'bhiṣeko jinapativacanenāvadhūtasya deyo yathānukrameṇa saptābhiṣekastato deyaḥ |
analyzed: iha yadā avadhūtasya śiṣyasya dravya abhāvaḥ tadā guruṇā dravya abhāve bhiṣekaḥ jinapati vacanena avadhūtasya deyaḥ yathā anukrameṇa sapta abhiṣekaḥ tatas deyaḥ

original: kalaśādikastrividhaḥ evaṃ caturtho dhūmādimārge deya iti kathanīyo vāceti |
analyzed: kalaśa ādikaḥ trividhaḥ evam caturthaḥ dhūma ādi mārge deyaḥ iti kathanīyaḥ vācā iti

original: tathā sakalaguṇa nidhirnāḍikā yogayukto mahākṣarasukhakṣaṇo vācā kathanīyaḥ |
analyzed: tathā sakala guṇa nidhiḥ nāḍikā yoga yuktaḥ mahā akṣara sukha kṣaṇaḥ vācā kathanīyaḥ

original: tasya sevārthaṃ karmamudrā'bhāve sati hastamudrāniyamo deyaḥ |
analyzed: tasya sevā artham karma mudrā bhāve sati hasta mudrā niyamaḥ deyaḥ

original: svahṛdayavaśagā sā hastamudrā sarvadoṣa- vimuktā bodhicittasthirīkaraṇāyeti niyamaḥ |
analyzed: sva hṛdaya vaśagā sā hasta mudrā sarva doṣa vimuktā bodhi citta sthirīkaraṇāya iti niyamaḥ

original: anyeṣāṃ punargṛhasthānāṃ naiva deyaṃ jinavara- hṛdayaṃ vajrapadaṃ mātṛpūjāvihīnamiti tathāgatase kaniyamaḥ || 200 ||
analyzed: anyeṣām punar gṛhasthānām na eva deyam jinavara hṛdayam vajra padam mātṛ pūjā vihīnam iti tathāgata se ka niyamaḥ

original: dattaṃ idānīṃ maṇḍalavisarjana mucyate- sekānte śrīghaṭānāṃ mṛdutanusukhadaṃ kañcukaṃ vastrayugmaṃ deyaṃ śrīyoginībhyastvaparamapi tathā kañcukaṃ vastrayugmam |
analyzed: dattam idānīm maṇḍala visarjana mucyate seka ante śrī ghaṭānām mṛdu tanu sukha dam kañcukam vastra yugmam deyam śrī yoginībhyaḥ tu aparam api tathā kañcukam vastra yugmam

original: dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ sakalagaṇakulāyātmaśaktyā tathānyad ante homaṃ prakṛtya svahṛdayakamale jñānasattvaṃ praveśya || 201 ||
analyzed: dvāra sthebhyaḥ pradeyam sakala gaṇa kulāya ātma śaktyā tathā anyat ante homam prakṛtya sva hṛdaya kamale jñāna sattvam praveśya
sa ikā ante ityādinā

original: iha sekāvasāne yadvastrayugmaṃ sakañcukaṃ ghaṭopari tadyoginībhyo ghaṭarakṣapālikābhyo deyam |
analyzed: iha seka avasāne yat vastra yugmam sa kañcukam ghaṭa upari tat yoginībhyaḥ ghaṭara kṣapālikābhyaḥ deyam

original: aparamapi tathā kanakaṃ • • vimalaprabhāyāṃ vastrayugmam, pratyekaṃ dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāg yathāvibhavato mukuṭādikaṃ deyamiti niyamaḥ |
analyzed: aparam api tathā kanakam vimalaprabhāyām vastra yugmam pratyekam dvārasthebhyaḥ pradeyam rakṣapālebhyaḥ prāk yathā vibhavataḥ mukuṭa ādikam deyam iti niyamaḥ

original: tathā sakalagaṇakulāyātmaśaktyā tathānyad gaṇacakre voravīreśvarībhya iti |
analyzed: tathā sakala gaṇakulāya ātma śaktyā tathā anyat gaṇacakre vora vīra īśvarībhyaḥ iti

original: tato gaṇacakraṃ visarjya ante homaṃ prakṛtyācāryaḥ pūrvavat pūjāṃ kṛtvā pūrvadvāre bhagavato'bhimukho vajravajraghaṇṭāṃ gṛhītvā vajrabandhena svahṛdayakamale jñānasattvaṃ praveśya || 201 ||
analyzed: tatas gaṇacakram visarjya ante homam prakṛtya ācāryaḥ pūrvavat pūjām kṛtvā pūrva dvāre bhagavataḥ bhimukhaḥ vajra vajra ghaṇṭām gṛhītvā vajra bandhena sva hṛdaya kamale jñāna sattvam praveśya

original: svasthāne laukikān ve sakalamapi rajo vāhayecchuddhanadyāṃ tāmbūlaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ kusumaphalasamaṃ śāṭikāṃ kanyakānām |
analyzed: sva sthāne laukikān sakalam api rajaḥ vāhayet śuddha nadyām tāmbūlam gandha dhūpam kusuma phala samam śāṭikām kanyakānām

original: dattvā''cāryaḥ saśiṣyaḥ sakalagaṇakulaṃ tarpayitvā yatheṣṭaṃ śiṣyasyājñāṃ pradāya pravarakaruṇayā preṣayet svasvadhāni || 202||
analyzed: dattvā ca āryaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ sakala gaṇa kulam tarpayitvā yatheṣṭam śiṣyasya ājñām pradāya pravara karuṇayā preṣayet sva svadhāni

original: svasthāne laukikān vai indrādīn tato'śvatthapatreṇa svakareṇa vā vajreṇa vā brahmasūtramārgeṇa mahāsukhacakravajraṃ yāvallopayet tataḥ svaśirasi rajastruṭimātraṃ dattvā padmādikaṃ lopayet iti maṇḍalavisarjana niyamaḥ |
analyzed: sva sthāne laukikān vai indra ādīn śvattha patreṇa sva kareṇa vā vajreṇa vā brahmasūtra mārgeṇa mahāsukhacakra vajram yāvat lopayet tatas sva śirasi rajaḥ truṭi mātram dattvā padma ādikam lopayet

original: tataḥ sakalaṃ rajo gajopari chatra- cāmaradhvajapūjāsahitaṃ nītvā śuddhanadyāṃ samudragāminyāṃ vāhayet |
analyzed: tatas sakalam rajaḥ gaja upari chatra dhvaja pūjā sahitam nītvā śuddha nadyām samudra gāminyām vāhayet

original: yatra kalaśe nītaṃ taṃ kalaśamudakapūrṇa kṛtvā punargajaskandhe sthāpya maṇḍalagṛhamānayet |
analyzed: yatra kalaśe nītam tam kalaśam udaka pūrṇa kṛtvā punar gaja skandhe sthāpya maṇḍalagṛham ānayet

original: dikpadmeṣvabdhibuddhāḥ khalu navanayanā vahnivaktrartu hastā: koṇe tārādidevyaḥ punarapi ca tayoraṣṭakakṣe'ṣṭakumbhāḥ
analyzed: diś padmeṣu abdhi buddhāḥ khalu nava nayanāḥ vahni vaktra ṛtu hastā koṇe tārā ādi devyaḥ punar api ca tayoḥ aṣṭa kakṣe ṣṭa kumbhāḥ

original: kṛṣṇā raktā ca pītā śaśadharadhavalā devatā devatī ca kṛṣṇā śvetendumūrdhni tvatha vidiśi gate raktapīte'rkamūrdhni || 19 ||

original: idānīṃ nāmarūpādyutpādāya mahārāgavaineyasaptaloka mādibuddhadeśanāyāṃ bhājana- mabhisaṃvīkṣya suratadhvaninā svakāye'kṣobhyādijinasamūhaṃ praveśyākāśādidhātusamūhaṃ utpattikrameṇa kāryaniṣpattimahoddeśaḥ 'taṃ puruṣa vidyā cakṣurādirūpādiviṣayasvabhāvena devatāsvarūpāvirbhūtaṃ punarapi svakāyānniścārya viśvamātari yathāvadantarbhāvayet

analyzed: tatas tathā eva niścārya punar api maṇḍala cakra ākārān tathāgatān sa dhātūn sva kāye praveśya candra drava āpanna anu sva kuliśena utsṛjya sva vidyā kamala udare tat parāvṛttam devatā devatī

original: vidveṣaḥ stobhanecchā bhavati nṛpa tathā pauṣṭikaṃ stambhanecchā tārādevyādiśuddhaghā tribhuvanajanano māraṇotpādanecchā ||43||

original: iha jātabālasya madhyamāprāṇanirgamo nīlābhaḥ, tasya nirgame- ne (ṇe) ndriyāṇāṃ prabodho bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ ṣaḍvijñānānāṃ pravṛttiradhyātmani |

original: ato bāhya- devatāniṣpattau nīlābhaṃ prāṇaṃ madhyamāviśuddhayā vajjravegaṃ bhomakāyaṃ prahasitavadanaṃ cārdha- vaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ garjantaṃ dvādaśanetraṃ dvayadhikajinakaraṃ ṣaḍviṃśatibhujaṃ |

original: 30. mārīcī gandhavatrā prabhavati bhṛkuṭī caiva cundā prasiddhā 31. jñātavyā jātibhedāt khalu rasakuliśā rūpavajrā narendra
analyzed: mārīcī gandhavatrā prabhavati bhṛkuṭī ca eva cundā prasiddhā jñātavyā jāti bhedāt khalu rasakuliśāḥ rūpa vajrāḥ narendra

original: 32. stambhaḥ kālāntako'traiva punaratibalo vighnaśatruḥ prasiddho 33. jambha: prajñāntako vai prabhavati ca tathā mānaka: padmaśatruḥ || 90 ||
analyzed: stambhaḥ punar atibalaḥ vighnaśatruḥ prasiddhaḥ jambha prajñā antakaḥ vai prabhavati ca tathā mānaka padmaśatruḥ

original: 34. cāmuṇḍā śūkarīśā marudanala jalakṣmāstathendrī caturthī 35. gandho rūpaṃ rasaḥ sparśa iti calahare daityavahnau sthitāśca
analyzed: cāmuṇḍā śūkarī īśā marut anala jalakṣmāḥ tathā indrī caturthī gandhaḥ rūpam rasaḥ sparśaḥ iti calahare daitya vahnau sthitāḥ ca

original: 36. brahmā vairocano vai bhavati kulavaśāt sāgaraścāmitābho 37. vahniḥ śrīratnapāṇirbhavati hi pavano'moghasiddhistathaiva || 91 || 52. vimalaprabhāyāṃ 53. akṣobhyo daityaśatrurbhavati jinapatiḥ śaṅkaraśca prasiddho 54. viṣkambhī yaḥ sa śakro bhavati gaṇapatirlokanāthastathaiva
analyzed: brahmā vairocanaḥ vai bhavati kula vaśāt sāgaraḥ ca amita ābhaḥ vahniḥ śrīratnapāṇiḥ bhavati hi pavanaḥ moghasiddhiḥ tathā eva vimalaprabhāyām akṣobhyaḥ daityaśatruḥ bhavati jinapatiḥ śaṅkaraḥ

original: 38. bhūgarbhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ syād bhavati danupatiḥ śrīkhagarbhaḥ prasiddha: 56. kāla: śrīvajrapāṇirbhavati danupativiśvabhadraśca ṣaṣṭhaḥ || 92 ||
analyzed: bhū garbhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ syāt bhavati danupatiḥ śrīkha garbhaḥ śrīvajrapāṇiḥ bhavati danupati viśvabhadraḥ ca ṣaṣṭhaḥ

original: 39. ṣaḍ vidyāḥ ṣaṭ na vajrāḥ prakṛtiguṇavaśāt svasvamudrāśca teṣāṃ 58. mudrā vidyādayo'rkāḥ suravarapatayaḥ śvetakṛṣṇāśca pūrṇāḥ
analyzed: ṣaḍ vidyāḥ ṣaṭ na vajrāḥ prakṛti guṇa vaśāt sva sva mudrāḥ ca teṣām mudrāḥ vidyā ādayaḥ rkāḥ suravara patayaḥ śveta kṛṣṇāḥ ca pūrṇāḥ

original: 40. teṣāṃ yāḥ padmapatre va karatithayo māghamāsādayastāḥ 60. ṣaṇmāse pūrvaṣaṭkaṃ bhavati kulavaśāccāparaṃ devatīnām ||93||
analyzed: teṣām yāḥ māgha māsa ādayaḥ tāḥ ṣaṣ māse pūrva ṣaṭkam bhavati kula vaśāt ca aparam devatīnām

original: 41. ye nāgāṣṭo ghaṭāste vibhukamaladale śaktayastāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ 62. śrīdhūmā kākavaktrā bhavati kulavaśād gṛdhravaktrā marīciḥ
analyzed: ye nāga aṣṭa ghaṭāḥ te vibhu kamala dale śaktayaḥ tāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ śrīdhūmā kāka vaktrā bhavati kula vaśāt gṛdhra vaktrā marīciḥ

original: 42. khadyotolūkavaktrā khagapativadanā śrīpradīpā prasiddhā 64. śvānāsyā kṛṣṇadīptā suvikṛtavadanā śūkarāsyātidīptā || 14 ||
analyzed: khadyota ulūka vaktrā khaga pati vadanā śrīpradīpā prasiddhā śvāna āsyā kṛṣṇa dīptā su vikṛta vadanā śūkara āsyā ati dīptā

original: 43. vyāghrāsyā śvetadīptā bhavati kulavaśājjambukī pītadīptā 66. evaṃ lāsyādisarvā: prakaṭadaśavidhā viśvamātāvaśeṣāḥ
analyzed: vyāghrāsyā śveta dīptā bhavati kula vaśāt jambukī pīta dīptā evam lāsya ādi sarvā prakaṭa daśavidhā viśvamātṛ avaśeṣāḥ

original: idānīṃ janyajanakādisambandhaḥ śrīvatrī viśvabhadraḥ ( ) ityādisārdhanava- 68. vṛttāni viśvamātāvaśeṣā : ( ) iti paryantaṃ kulakulīnayoḥ sambandhaḥ ||| 86 - 943 ||
analyzed: idānīm janya janaka ādi sambandhaḥ śrīvatrī viśvabhadraḥ ityādi sārdha nava vṛttāni viśvamātā avaśeṣāḥ iti paryantam kula kulīnayoḥ sambandhaḥ

original: idānīṃ vatuḥ kāyapariśuddhirucyate - 70. divyā buddhāśca vidyāḥ satarusakalaśāḥ śuddhakāyo jinasya kāyamaṇḍale pravararathagatā 'mārīcyādayaḥ sūryadevāḥ prasiddhāḥ
analyzed: idānīm vatuḥ kāya pariśuddhiḥ ucyate divyāḥ buddhāḥ ca vidyāḥ sa tarusa kalaśāḥ śuddha kāyaḥ jinasya kāya maṇḍale pravara ratha gatāḥ mārīci ādayaḥ sūryadevāḥ prasiddhāḥ
nairṛtya ādayaḥ dvādaśa
aṣṭau nāgāḥ karkoṭaka ādayaḥ
pracaṇḍāḥ śvānāsya ādayaḥ
ete deva ādayaḥ parijana sahitāḥ
padma dale devatābhiḥ saha buddha nirmāṇa kāyaḥ

original: evaṃ bhūyo dvibhedo bhavati jinatanurbāhyato'bhyantare ca
analyzed: evam bhūyas dvi bhedaḥ bhavati jina tanuḥ bāhyatas bhyantare ca

original: garbhotpattiryathaiva prabhavati niyatā maṇḍale tadvadeveti || 96 || śāstā divyādikumbhāḥ sahajajinatanurmaṇḍale garbhamadhye buddhādyā dharmakāyaḥ khalu rasakuliśādyāśca saṃbhogakāyaḥ
analyzed: garbha utpattiḥ yathā eva prabhavati niyatā maṇḍale tadvat eva iti śāstā divya ādi kumbhāḥ sahaja jina tanuḥ maṇḍale garbha madhye buddha ādyāḥ dharmakāyaḥ khalu rasa kuliśa ādyāḥ ca

original: krodhā nirmāṇakāyo bhavati kulavaśānmaṇḍale garbhasaṃsthā- icāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāḥ śuddhakāyo hi bāhye ||17|| iha garbhe yathā bālasya vijñānaṃ jñānaṃ śukrarajogarbhe śuddhakāya:, tathā śāstā bhagavān
analyzed: krodhā nirmāṇa kāyaḥ bhavati kula vaśāt maṇḍale garbha saṃsthā icāmuṇḍā ādi aṣṭa devyaḥ parijana sahitāḥ śuddha kāyaḥ hi bāhye iha garbhe yathā bālasya vijñānam jñānam śukra

original: divyā dhūmādayaḥ, ādiśabdena dharmaśaṅkhādayo'ṣṭakumbhā ete maṇḍalagarbha sahajakā iti
analyzed: divyāḥ dhūma ādayaḥ ādi śabdena dharmaśaṅkha ādayaḥ ṣṭa kumbhāḥ ete maṇḍala garbha sahajakāḥ iti

original: tathā bālasya skandhadhātūdbhavo dharmakāyastathā maṇḍale buddhācā iti
analyzed: tathā bālasya skandha dhātu udbhavaḥ dharmakāyaḥ tathā maṇḍale iti
tatas yathā bālasya āyatana udbhavaḥ saṃbhoga kāyaḥ tathā maṇḍale pi
khalu śabda vajra ādayaḥ iti

original: tato yathā bālasya hastapādādikeśādisaṃbhavaḥ prasavana samayaśca nirmāṇakāya:, tathā yamāntakādayaścatuḥ krodhā iti kulavaśāmmaṇḍale garbha saṃsthā iti cittamaṇḍale cittakulavaśāditi garbhe caturdhā niyamaḥ
analyzed: tatas yathā bālasya hasta pāda ādi keśa ādi saṃbhavaḥ samayaḥ ca nirmāṇakāya tathā yama antaka ādayaḥ catuḥ krodhāḥ iti garbha saṃsthāḥ iti citta maṇḍale citta kula vaśāt iti garbhe caturdhā
idānīm bāhye caturdhā ucyate cāmuṇḍa ityādi

original: iha yathotpannasya bālasya 'nābhicakrāt prāṇanirgamaḥ sahajakāyastathā bāhye vāṅmaṇḍale cāmuṇḍādyaṣṭadevyaḥ parijanasahitāścatuḥṣaṣṭi- yoginībhiḥ sahitā iti || 97 || vimalaprabhāyāṃ devādyā dharmaṃkāyaḥ sakalaphaṇikulaṃ cātra saṃbhogakāya- icaṇḍā nirmāṇakāyo bhavati narapate sarvasattvārthahetoḥ
analyzed: iha yathā utpannasya bālasya nābhi cakrāt prāṇa nirgamaḥ sahaja kāyaḥ tathā bāhye vāc maṇḍale cāmuṇḍa ādi aṣṭa devyaḥ parijana sahitāḥ catuḥṣaṣṭi yoginībhiḥ sahitāḥ iti

original: yugmaṃ syāt kāyavajraṃ sahaja jinatanubimba niṣpattiheto- rvāgvajraṃ dharmakāyo bhavati ca yugalaṃ dharmatādeśanārtham ||98|| iha yathā bālasya hastapādādi saṃkucanamasphuṭavacanaṃ dharmakāyastathā devā dvādaśa
analyzed: yugmam syāt kāya vajram sahaja jina tanu bimba niṣpatti hetoḥ rvāc vajram dharmakāyaḥ bhavati ca yugalam dharmatā deśanā artham iha yathā bālasya hasta pāda ādi saṃkucanam asphuṭa vacanam
ādi śabdena ratha sthāḥ ṣaḍ devyaḥ iti

original: iha yathā bālasya dantotthāne sphuṭavacane sati 'saṃbhoga kāyastathā maṇḍale sakala phaṇikulamiti
analyzed: iha yathā bālasya danta utthāne sphuṭa vacane sati saṃbhoga kāyaḥ tathā maṇḍale sakala phaṇi kulam iti

original: iha yathā bālasya dantapātāt punarutthānādāmaraṇāvadhau nirmāṇakāyastathā maṇḍale caṇḍā śvānāsyādayaḥ parijana- sahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭibhūtaiḥ sahitā nirmāṇakāyo bhavati, narapate sarvasattvārthahetoriti 'bāhye catuḥ kāryāviśuddhiniyamaḥ
analyzed: iha yathā bālasya dantapātāt punarutthānāt āmaraṇa avadhau nirmāṇa kāyaḥ tathā maṇḍale caṇḍā śvānāsya ādayaḥ parijana sahitāḥ sārdhatrikoṭi bhūtaiḥ sahitāḥ nirmāṇa kāyaḥ bhavati

original: idānīṃ catuḥkāyacaturvajrāṇāṃ parasparaṃ yoga ucyate- yugmamityādi
analyzed: idānīm catuḥkāya catur vajrāṇām parasparam yogaḥ ucyate yugmam ityādi

original: iha bālasya bimbaniṣpattihetoḥ sahajakāyaścaturbhūtātmakaṃ kāyavajraṃ yugmaṃ syād yathā, tathā maṇḍale'pi || 98 || cittaṃ saṃbhogakāyo yugalamapi bhavet sarvasattvārthakartā jñānaṃ nirmāṇakāyo bhavati hi yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadaṃ ve
analyzed: iha bālasya bimba niṣpatti hetoḥ sahaja kāyaḥ caturbhūta ātmakam kāyavajram yugmam syāt yathā tathā maṇḍale cittam saṃbhoga kāyaḥ yugalam api bhavet sarva sattva artha kartā jñānam nirmāṇa

original: prajñopāyāṅgabhāvaḥ samaviṣamakulairyoginā veditavyaṃ candrādityādikādyaistrividhabhavagatairjñānavijñānabhedaiḥ ||99|| evaṃ vāgvajraṃ dharmakāyo bālasya yugalamapi jalpanārthaṃ yathā tathā dharmadeśanārthaṃ maṇḍale'pi
analyzed: prajñā upāya aṅga bhāvaḥ sama viṣama kulaiḥ yoginā veditavyam candra āditya ādika ādyaiḥ trividha bhava gataiḥ jñāna vijñāna bhedaiḥ evam vāc vajram dharmakāyaḥ bālasya yugalam api jalpana artham

original: iha bālasya bodhicittaṃ saṃbhogakāyaḥ sarvasattvārtha' kartā yugalam, tathā maṇḍale'pi
analyzed: iha bālasya bodhi cittam saṃbhoga kāyaḥ sarva sattva artha kartā yugalam tathā maṇḍale pi

original: iha yathā bālasya cyavanakāle jñānamiti sukhaṃ nirmāṇakāya iti paripūrṇa- dhātutvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadherbhavati hi yugalaṃ prāṇināṃ mokṣadaṃ vaṃ
analyzed: iha yathā bālasya cyavana kāle jñānam iti sukham nirmāṇa kāyaḥ iti dhātu tvam ṣoḍaśa varṣa avadheḥ bhavati hi yugalam prāṇinām mokṣa dam vaṃ

analyzed: tat dadāta iti mokṣa dam yugalam jñānam nirmāṇa kāya lakṣaṇam prāṇinām

analyzed: tathā tad vaidharmyeṇa maṇḍale mokṣa dam dvādaśa aṅga hetu phala nirodhataḥ iti buddha niyamaḥ

original: • prāṇadeva totpādamahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānamucyate- vajraḥ svāhānuyuktaḥ śirasi galahṛdornābhiguhye ca mūrdhni etaiścādhiṣṭhitāṅgaṃ paramajinapati snāpayed devatībhiḥ

analyzed: yathā utpannasya bālasya kāya vāc citta adhiṣṭhānam jāgrat svapna suṣupta lakṣaṇam bhavati lalāṭe kaṇṭhe hṛdaye nābhau guhye uṣṇīṣe om āḥ hūm ho svāhā

original: atrādhiṣṭhāne lalāṭe akārapariṇataṃ candramaṇḍalam, tadupari oṅkāra- pariṇatamaṣṭāracakram, tatpariṇataṃ kāyavajraṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trimukhaṃ mūlaṃ śuklaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ṣaḍbhujaṃ dakṣiṇe cakravajrapadmadharaṃ vāme khaḍgaghaṇṭāmaṇidharaṃ, saprajñaṃ niṣpādya tato lalāṭānniścārya tenākāśadhātuṃ samantāt paripūrṇa vibhāvya kāyavajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā punarāgatyātmanaḥ purataḥ saṃsthāpyābhiṣekamanunāthayet

iti kāya adhiṣṭhānam

original: evaṃ kaṇṭhe rephapariṇataṃ sūryamaṇḍalam, tadupari āḥkārapariṇataṃ raktapadmamaṣṭadalaṃ tatpariṇataṃ vāgvajraṃ saprajñaṃ raktaṃ raktasitakṛṣṇavadanaṃ, dakṣiṇe padmavajracakradharaṃ vāme maṇighaṇṭākhaṅgadharaṃ niścāryākāśadhātuṃ tena paripūrṇa vibhāvya vāgvajravaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā punarātmano'grataḥ saṃsthāpyā'bhiṣeka manunāthayet - abhiṣiñcantu māṃ vāgvajriṇaḥ

original: tato vākkula 'devībhiramṛtaghaṭairabhiṣiñcyamānamātmānaṃ vibhāvya tato vāgadhiṣṭhānaṃ kuryāt, vāgvajraṃ sūryamaṇḍale viniveśya idamudīrayet - vāgvajradharaḥ śrīmān trivajrābhedyabhāvitaḥ

original: iha pratyāhāra ādikarmaṇi jinendra iti jñānaskandhaḥ
analyzed: iha pratyāhāraḥ ādikarmaṇi jinendraḥ iti jñāna skandhaḥ

original: sa ca nimittabhedena daśavidho dhūmamarīcikhadyotadīpajvālācandrādityarāhukalābindu- darśanabhedenākalpito jñānaskandhaḥ

original: dhyānamakṣobhya eva daśavidho vijñāna skandho viṣaya- viṣayiṇāṃ daśānāmekatvaṃ viśvabimbe dhyānamiti

original: ḍombyāṃ cānusmṛtiḥ syādapi kamalaghara iti saṃjñāskandho daśavidhaḥ

analyzed: ādika ādyaiḥ iti svara vyañjanaiḥ vāma dakṣiṇa prāṇa sañcāraḥ idānīm pratyāhāra ādi lakṣaṇam ucyate pratyāhāraḥ daśānām viṣaya viṣayiṇām apravṛttiḥ śarīre prajñā tarkaḥ vicāraḥ

pratya ityādi

original: iha pratyāhāro nāma śarīre viṣayaviṣayiṇāṃ daśānāṃ sambandhenā- pravṛttivijñānasya śūnyabimbe, viṣayeṣu pravṛttiranyaiścakṣurādibhiḥ pañcavidhairiti
analyzed: iha pratyāhāraḥ nāma śarīre viṣaya viṣayiṇām daśānām sambandhena ā pravṛtti vijñānasya śūnyabimbe viṣayeṣu pravṛttiḥ anyaiḥ cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ pañcavidhaiḥ iti

original: idānīṃ pratyāhārādiphalamucyate- pratyāhāreṇa yogī viṣayavirahito'dhiṣṭhyate sarvamantraḥ pañcābhijñānalābho bhavati narapate dhyānayogena śuddhaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmena śuddhaḥ śaśiravirahitaḥ pūjyate bodhisattva- marikleśādināśaṃ viśati daśabalaṃ dhāraṇāyā balena || 118 ||
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena śuddhaḥ śaśiḥ avirahitaḥ pūjyate bodhisattva mari kleśa ādi nāśam viśati daśa balam dhāraṇāyāḥ balena

original: pratyetyādi iha pratyāhāreṇa yogoṃ yadā viśuddho bhavati bimbena sthirobhūtena, tadā sarvamantrairadhiṣṭhaghate, vacasā varadānādikaṃ dadāti pañcābhijñānalābhī bhavati narapate dhyānayogena śuddha iti iha yadā'nimiṣitacakṣurbhavati tadā divyacakṣurbhavati evaṃ divya śrotro dhyānena śuddho bhavati prāṇāyāmena śuddha iti iha yadā raviśaśimārga- rahito yogī bhavati sadā madhyamāvāhakaḥ, tadā prāṇāyāmena śuddhaḥ san pūjyate bodhisattvaḥ, praśaṃsyata ityarthaḥ mārakleśādināśaṃ viśati daśabalamiti śūnyatā- bimbam iha grāhyagrāhakacittaṃ viśati dhāraṇāyā baleneti prāṇasya gatāgatakṣayeṇa ekalolībhavati || 118 ||
analyzed: prati ityādi iha pratyāhāreṇa yoga oṃ yadā viśuddhaḥ bhavati bimbena sthirobhūtena tadā vacasā vara dāna ādikam dadāti pañca abhijñāna lābhī bhavati narapate dhyāna yogena śuddhaḥ iti iha yadā grāhya grāhaka cittam viśati dhāraṇāyāḥ balena iti prāṇasya gata āgata kṣayeṇa ekalolībhavati

original: saṃśuddho'nusmṛteḥ syād vimalamapi prabhāmaṇḍalaṃ jñānabimbāt tasmācchuddhaḥ samādhau katipayadivasaiḥ siddhayate jñānadehaḥ
analyzed: saṃśuddhaḥ nu smṛteḥ syāt vimalam api prabhā maṇḍalam jñāna bimbāt tasmāt śuddhaḥ samādhau katipaya divasaiḥ jñāna dehaḥ

original: pratyāhārādibhirvai yadi bhavati na sā mantriṇāmiṣṭasiddhi-
analyzed: pratyāhāra ādibhiḥ vai yadi bhavati na sā mantriṇām iṣṭa siddhi
sādhayet bindu rodhāt

original: saṃśuddho'nusmṛteriti ihānusmṛtibimbāliṅganaṃ cittasya sarvavikalparahitatvam, tasmācchuddho yadā tadā vimalaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalaṃ bhavati api ca śabdād romakūpāt spharanti pañcaraśmayo niścaranti jñānavimbācnyavimbāditi tasmācchuddhaḥ samādhāviti iha grāhyagrāhakacittayorekatvena yadakṣarasukhaṃ bhavati, tatsukhaṃ samādhi- rucyate tasmāt samādhiśuddho vaimalyaṃ gataḥ katipayadivasaistrivarṣatripakṣa divasaiḥ siddhaghate jñānadeha iti daśavaśitādikaṃ prāpto bodhisattvo bhavatīti pratyāhārādi- niyamaḥ kha.
analyzed: saṃśuddhaḥ nu smṛteḥ iti iha anusmṛti bimba āliṅganam cittasya sarva vikalpa rahita tvam tasmāt śuddhaḥ yadā tadā vimalam prabhā maṇḍalam bhavati api ca śabdāt romakūpāt spharanti pañca

original: ga. cha. bho. eṣāṃ ca yadā yogī ga. ca. bho. miṣaca ca. bho. 'iha' nāsti cha. dinaiḥ |
analyzed: ga cha bho eṣām ca yadā yogī ca bho ca bho iha na asti dinaiḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ sādhanā- idānīṃ haṭhayoga ucyate iha yadā pratyāhārāvibhirbimbe dṛṣṭe satyakṣarakṣaṇaṃ' notpadyate, ayantrita prāṇatayā, tadā nādābhyāsād vakṣyamāṇād haṭhena 'prāṇaṃ madhyamāyāṃ vāhayitvā prajñā'bjagatakuliśamaṇau bodhicittabindu nirodhādakṣarakṣaṇaṃ sādhayennispande- neti haṭhayogaḥ || 119 ||
analyzed: vimala prabhāyām sādhanā idānīm haṭhayogaḥ ucyate iha yadā pratyāhāra avibhiḥ bimbe dṛṣṭe sati akṣa rakṣaṇam na utpadyate prāṇatayā tadā nāda abhyāsāt vakṣyamāṇāt haṭhena prāṇam

original: idānīṃ śūnyatābimbasādhanāya dṛṣṭirucyate- sevāyāmādiyogo nabhasi daśavidhaścakriṇaḥ krodhadṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭyā vighnāntakasyāmṛtapathagatayā copasādhye ṣaḍaṅgaḥ |
analyzed: idānīm śūnyatā bimba sādhanāya dṛṣṭiḥ ucyate sevāyām ādi yogaḥ nabhasi daśavidhaḥ cakriṇaḥ krodha dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭyā vighna antakasya amṛta patha gatayā ca upasādhye ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ

original: prajñā sṛṣṭendubindorapi kuliśamaṇī tryakṣaraḥ sādhane syāt sokhyā'naṣṭe kaśāntaḥ sahaja iha mahāsādhane jñānayogaḥ || 120 ||
analyzed: prajñā sṛṣṭā indu bindoḥ api kuliśamaṇī tri akṣaraḥ sādhane syāt sokhyā naṣṭe sahajaḥ iha mahā sādhane jñāna yogaḥ

original: sevetyādi iha sevetyādidhūmādinimittabhāvanā, tasyāṃ sevāyāmādiyogo dhūmādi- nimittagrahaṇaṃ cittasyeti sa ca daśavidho dhūmādinā sādhaṃ pratyayo bhavati tena daśavidhaḥ sa ca cakriṇa ityuṣṇīṣasya krodhadṛṣṭyā iti ūrdhvadṛṣṭyā'nimiṣayā nimittaṃ bhavati rātriyogena catuvidham divāyogena ṣaḍvidham tato bimbaparyantaṃ sevāṅgaṃ bhavati pratyāhāreṇa dhyāneneti dṛṣṭyā vighnāntakasyeti vighnāntako mṛta- kuṇḍalī, tasya dṛṣṭiramṛtasthānagatā lalāṭagatā, tayā dṛṣṭyā vighnāntakasyāmṛtapathagasyā copasādhane ṣaḍaṅgaḥ cakārāt prāṇāyāmo dhāraṇā kartavyā prāṇasya bimbe dṛṣṭe sati upasādhanam prajñāsṛṣṭendubindoriti iha prajñārāgeṇa sṛṣṭaścāsāvindubinduḥ sṛṣṭendu- bindu:, tasya prajñāsṛṣṭabodhicittavindorapi kuliśamaṇau gatasya yastrayakṣaro 'yogo bhavati guhye nābhau hṛdaye, sa sādhane syāditi sādhanāṅke tṛtīye bhavati evaṃ sādhanāṅgaṃ kartavyam saukhyā'naṣṭaikaśānta iti iha saukhyenānaṣṭena bodhicittasya ya ekakṣaṇaḥ, sa śānta ityucyate sahaja iha mahāsādhane jñānayoga iti cittasyākṣarasukhena sahaika- tvamiti mahāsādhanāṅgaṃ caturtham evaṃ jñānasādhane caturaṅgam devatāsādhana utpatti- krameṇa pūrvoktaṃ laukikam, lokottaratattvasādhanamutpannakrameṇa tathā hi- satyadvayaṃ samāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā |
analyzed: sevā ityādi iha sevā ityādi dhūma ādi nimitta bhāvanā tasyām sevāyām ādi yogaḥ dhūma ādi nimitta grahaṇam cittasya iti sa ca daśavidhaḥ dhūma ādinā pratyayaḥ bhavati tena daśavidhaḥ sa ca cakārāt prāṇāyāmaḥ dhāraṇā kartavyā prāṇasya bimbe dṛṣṭe sati upasādhanam prajñā sṛṣṭa indu bindoḥ iti iha prajñā rāgeṇa sṛṣṭaḥ ca asau indu binduḥ sṛṣṭa indu bindu tasya caturtham evam jñāna sādhane catur aṅgam devatā sādhane utpatti krameṇa pūrva uktam laukikam lokottara tattva sādhanam utpanna krameṇa tathā hi satya dvayam samāśritya buddhānām dharma deśanā
loka saṃvṛti satyena satyena paramārthataḥ

original: iti bhagavato niyamaḥ punaḥ- kramadvayaṃ samāśritya deśanā vajriṇo mama |
analyzed: iti bhagavataḥ niyamaḥ punar krama dvayam samāśritya deśanā vajriṇaḥ mama
utpatti krameṇa ekā parā

original: ka. kha. ga. cha. kṣaṇo bho, 'prāṇa' nāsti ga. niroghakṣaṇarakṣaṇaṃ ka. kha. ga. bho. itaḥ paraṃ 'bimbamevam' ityadhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ ga. 'dṛṣṭyā 'kasyeti' nāsti bho. ‘yogo' nāsti ca. nāṅge bho. De bşin Du gSuis Pa ( tathāha ) ga. ' puna: ' nāsti |
analyzed: ka kha ga cha kṣaṇaḥ bho prāṇa na asti ga nirogha kṣaṇa rakṣaṇam ka kha ga bho itas param bimbam evam iti adhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ ga dṛṣṭyā kasya iti na asti bho yogaḥ na asti ca na aṅge

original: paṭale ilo utpannakramasādhanamahoddeśaḥ evaṃ devatāsādhane vikalpabhāvanā, tattvasādhane vikalparahitaiścaturaṅgeriti nyāyaḥ || 120 ||
analyzed: paṭale utpanna krama sādhana mahā uddeśaḥ evam devatā sādhane vikalpa bhāvanā tattva sādhane vikalpa rahitaiḥ caturaṅgeḥ iti nyāyaḥ

original: idānīṃ prāṇāyāmalakṣaṇamucyate- prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt samasukhaphalado mastake yāvadiṣṭa: tasmādūdhvaṃ hyaniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaraḥ skandhanirnāśahetuḥ |
analyzed: idānīm prāṇāyāma lakṣaṇam ucyate prāṇāyāmaḥ samantāt sama sukha phala daḥ mastake yāvat iṣṭa tasmāt ūdhvam hi aniṣṭaḥ maraṇa bhaya karaḥ skandha nirnāśa hetuḥ

original: uṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā paramasukhapade yojanīyo vrajan ve skandhā'bhāve'pi yogī vrajati samasukhaṃ kintu loke'prasiddhiḥ || 121 ||
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā parama sukha pade yojanīyaḥ vrajan yogī vrajati sama sukham kintu loke prasiddhiḥ

original: prāṇetyādi iha śūnyatā bimbe dṛṣṭe sati yaḥ prāṇāyāmo yoginā kartavyaḥ, sa yāvanmastake iti śirovyathāṃ na karoti sa ca sa masukhaphalado bhavati tasmādūrdhvamiti śirovyathāntādaniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaro bhavati, skandhanirnāśahetubhūto bhavati |
analyzed: prāṇa ityādi iha śūnyatā bimbe dṛṣṭe sati yaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ yoginā kartavyaḥ sa yāvat mastake iti śiraḥ vyathām na karoti sa ca sa bhavati tasmāt ūrdhvam iti śiraḥ vyathā antāt

original: atha yogabalenoṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā prāṇo vrajan yoginā paramasukhapade śūnyatābimbe yojanīyo vai ekāntam |
analyzed: atha yoga balena uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā prāṇaḥ vrajan yoginā parama sukha pade śūnyatā bimbe yojanīyaḥ vai ekāntam

original: evaṃ skandhā'bhāve'pi yogī vrajati samasukhaṃ buddhabimbamiti yogīti yogacittaṃ vrajati |
analyzed: evam skandhāḥ bhāve yogī vrajati sama sukham buddha bimbam iti yogī iti yoga cittam vrajati

original: kintu loke'prasiddhiriti yogī mṛto'yamiti prāṇāyāma - niyamaḥ || 121 ||
analyzed: kintu loke prasiddhiḥ iti yogī mṛtaḥ yam iti prāṇāyāma niyamaḥ

original: madhye prāṇapraveśo viṣayavirahitāliṅganaṃ viśvamātuḥ padmāviṣṭaṃ svavajraspharaṇamapi tathendvarkamadhye praveśaḥ |
analyzed: madhye prāṇa praveśaḥ viṣaya virahita āliṅganam viśvamātuḥ padma āviṣṭam sva vajra spharaṇam api tathā indu arka madhye praveśaḥ

original: saukhyaṃ bījāprapāte surataratigataṃ yogināṃ yogameta- nmudrāsiddhayarthahetoḥ paramamapi vibhoḥ śrorahasyād rahasyam ||122||
analyzed: saukhyam bīja a prapāte surata rati gatam yoginām yogam eta nmudrā siddhaya artha hetoḥ paramam api vibhoḥ śro rahasyāt rahasyam

original: abjapūrva- patre karkoṭaḥ, agnau padmaḥ, dakṣiṇe vāsukiḥ, nairṛtye śaṅkhapālaḥ, uttare anantaḥ, īśāne kulikaḥ, paścime takṣakaḥ, vāyavye mahāpadmaḥ pūrvāgnau kṛṣṇo, dakṣiṇe nairṛtye raktau, uttareśāne śuklau, paścimavāyavye potau, api jayavijayau haritanīlau nāgarājānau pātayitvā'rkamūni arkamaṇḍale vāmadakṣiṇapādatale nābhyadhvaṃ puruṣākārāvadhaḥ sarpākārī śira upari saptaphaṇacakravāhau mahāmaṇibhiḥ sphurantāvuttānako pātayitvā 'apare- nāgarājān pātayitvā teṣāṃ lāṅgūlāgraṃ pratyekaṃ jayopari pūrvottarāṇām, vijayopari dakṣiṇapaścimānām

original: evaṃ pādābhyāṃ stambhayitvā phaṇipatimithunaṃ paṭale, 134- 139 ślo. ] nānāsādhanamahoddeśaḥ padmapatre sthitānāṃ lāṅgūlāgraṃ ca sarvamiti
analyzed: evam pādābhyām stambhayitvā phaṇi pati mithunam paṭale nānā sādhana mahā uddeśaḥ padma patre sthitānām lāṅgūla agram ca sarvam iti

original: evamau nāgarājāḥ pañca phaṇino ghanakulaṃ meghavṛndamudarānmuñcato vai samantāt

iti nāga rāja sādhana niyamaḥ

original: ityādyaṃ devatānāṃ bhavati narapate sādhanaṃ devatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ maṇḍale'smin svajinakulavaśāt karmabhedaiḥ samasteḥ

original: iha maṇḍale uktādyadaparaṃ devatā daivatānāṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati narapate pratyekaṃ maṇḍale'smin kavīraiḥ svajina kulavaśād vairocanādikulavaśāt, karmabhedaiḥ samastaiḥ sādhanaṃ bhavati

original: mantre bimbe tvasiddhe tribhuvananilaye siddhayate naiva kiñcit tasmād rājan svacittaṃ vyapagata kaluṣe sādhayenmantrabimbamādau vibhoriti niyamaḥ || 159 ||

analyzed: bhetavyam na asura indrāt api citi bhuvane mantriṇā siddhi hetaḥ dṛṣṭvā niṣkampa cittam vadati punar idam sādhitaḥ bhūtanāthaḥ
