original: netraḥ pittaiśca teṣāṃ bhavati varanṛṇāmañjanaṃ bhūprabhedaṃ antardhāne ca vaśye yuvatimanaharaṃ sādhitaṃ śrīśmaśāne
analyzed: pittaiḥ ca teṣām bhavati vara nṛṇām añjanam bhū prabhedam antardhāne ca vaśye yuvati mana haram sādhitam śrī śmaśāne
vimalaprabhāyām sādhanā siddhā ityādi

original: iha prathamaṃ gulikā sādhanamantraṃ pūrvoktavidhinā sādhayitvā oṃ kālacakra ājñāsiddha gulikāṃ sādhaya svāhā
analyzed: iha prathamam gulikā sādhana mantram pūrva ukta vidhinā sādhayitvā om kālacakre ājñā siddha gulikām sādhaya svāhā
tatas devatā pratyādeśaḥ bhavati gulikā sādhanāya

original: 'tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ - siddhā ityabhiṣekapaṭaloktānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatkhecarīṇāṃ pañcaṣadaśā- ṣṭāṣṭavargāḥ teṣāmeka [ 302b ]vargasya palalaṃ sādhayitvā chāyāśuṣkacūrṇaṃ kṛtvā pañcāmṛta- sahitam, tato'kṣobhyeṇa pīṣayitvā caṇakapramāṇāṃ gulikāṃ kṛtvā evaṃ siddheti
analyzed: tatra ayam vidhiḥ siddhāḥ iti abhiṣeka paṭala uktānām ṣaṭtriṃśat khecarīṇām ṣṭa aṣṭa vargāḥ teṣām eka b vargasya palalam sādhayitvā chāyāśuṣka cūrṇam kṛtvā pañcāmṛta sahitam

original: baddhā trilohairitīha kāyavākcittaśuddhayā candrārka rāhubhedena tāraṃ tāmra kāntalohaṃ dviloham
analyzed: baddhā trilohaiḥ iti iha kāya vāc citta śuddhayā rāhu bhedena tāram tāmra kāntaloham dvi loham
pratyeka baddhā trilohaiḥ baddhā iti
dadāti iti

original: tathā śvā'śvādīnāṃ bhūcarajalacarāṇām aṅgasya palalairgulikā siddhā baddhā trilo hai- apaharati tanau kṣutpipāsādirogāniti gulikā sādhana niyamaḥ
analyzed: tathā śvā śva ādīnām bhūcara jalacarāṇām aṅgasya palalaiḥ gulikā siddhā baddhā apaharati tanau kṣudh pipāsā ādi rogān iti gulikā sādhana niyamaḥ
idānīm añjana sādhanam ucyate netraiḥ ityādi
iha añjana sādhana mantram pūrvavat sādhayitvā tatas ñjanam sādhayet iti
om sādhaya svāhā

original: tataḥ khagānāṃ netrāṇi gṛhītvā sūkṣmacūrṇaṃ kṛtvā bodhicittena bhāvayet
analyzed: tatas khagānām netrāṇi gṛhītvā sūkṣma cūrṇam kṛtvā bodhi cittena bhāvayet
tat eva añjanam nidhāna siddhaye bhū prabhedam bhavati

original: pittaśceti śvā'śvādīnāṃ pitterañjanaṃ kṛtvā stropuṣpeṇa bhāvayet
analyzed: pittaḥ ca iti śvā śva ādīnām kṛtvā stropuṣpeṇa bhāvayet

original: tadevāñjanamantardhānaṃ karoti, antardhānaviṣaye vaśyaviṣaye yuvatimanoharaṃ bhavati sādhitaṃ śrīśmaśāne
analyzed: tat eva añjanam antardhānam karoti antardhāna viṣaye vaśya viṣaye yuvati manoharam bhavati sādhitam śrī śmaśāne

original: || 169 || kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ niśāyāmatha manudivase maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā rakṣāṃ kṛtvā samantācca palalagulikāṃ vāñjanaṃ tasya madhye
analyzed: kṛṣṇa aṣṭamyām niśāyām atha manu divase maṇḍalam vartayitvā rakṣām kṛtvā samantāt ca pala lagulikām vā añjanam tasya madhye
kṛtvā saṃpūjayitvā su surabhi kusumaiḥ mantra jāpam prakuryāt

original: raśmīn muñcanti yāvannabhasi raviriva grāhyamuddhṛtya tasmāt ||170||
analyzed: raśmīn muñcanti yāvat nabhasi raviḥ iva grāhyam uddhṛtya tasmāt

original: tatrāyaṃ vidhiḥ kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ niśāyām atha manudivasa iti kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ rātrī maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā pūrvoktadaityendrasādhane yad rakṣāṃ kṛtvā samantāt pūrvoktāṃ ca |
analyzed: tatra ayam vidhiḥ kṛṣṇa aṣṭamyām niśāyām atha manu divasaḥ iti kṛṣṇa caturdaśyām rātrī maṇḍalam vartayitvā pūrva ukta daitya indra sādhane yat rakṣām kṛtvā samantāt pūrva uktām ca

original: tato maṇḍalakaṇikāyāṃ gulikāṃ vāñjanaṃ vā kapālastham, tasya madhye sthāpayediti |
analyzed: tatas maṇḍala kaṇikāyām gulikām vā añjanam vā kapāla stham tasya madhye sthāpayet iti

original: evaṃ palalaṃ gulikāṃ vāñjanaṃ tasya madhye kṛtvā saṃpūjya susurabhikusumaistathā pūrvoktaṃ balyādikaṃ dattvā tato mantrajāpaṃ prakuryāt |
analyzed: evam palalam gulikām vā añjanam tasya madhye kṛtvā saṃpūjya su surabhi kusumaiḥ tathā pūrva uktam bali ādikam dattvā tatas mantra jāpam prakuryāt

original: pūrvoktamanena vidhinā kālacakrājñayā raśmīn muñcanti yāvada gulikām añjanāni vā tāvanmantraṃ  japet |
analyzed: pūrva uktam anena vidhinā kālacakra ājñayā raśmīn muñcanti yāvat a gulikām añjanāni vā tāvat mantram japet

original: tato grāhya- muddhṛtya tasmāda avadheḥ, yadi raśmīnna muñcanti tadā punarmantrasādhanaṃ kuryāt yāvaddevatā- pratyādeśo bhavati |
tato gulikāsaṃkhyayā narān gṛhītvā gulikāvidyādharo bhavati |
analyzed: tatas gulikā saṃkhyayā narān gṛhītvā gulikā vidyādharaḥ bhavati
eva mañjana vidyādharaḥ
evam ratna ādinā api

original: tatra mantraḥ - oṃ kālacakra ājñāsiddha khaṅgaṃ sādhaya svāhā |
analyzed: tatra mantraḥ om kālacakre ājñā siddha khaṅgam sādhaya svāhā
evam ratna ādiṣu ādau kālacakram iti niyamaḥ
tatra āyasam khaṅgam kṛtvā devatā niyamena sādhayet

original: sphāṭikaṃ ratnaṃ kṛtvā raupyaṃ kamalaṃ sovaṇaṃ cakraṃ nānāsādhanamahoddeśaḥ sarvalohamayaṃ vajraṃ ghaṇṭā'pyevaṃ kartikā'pyāyaseti cihnasādhananiyamaḥ |
analyzed: sphāṭikam ratnam kṛtvā raupyam kamalam sovaṇam cakram nānā sādhana mahā uddeśaḥ sarva loha mayam vajram ghaṇṭā pi evam kartikā pi āyasā iti cihna sādhana niyamaḥ
evam triśūla parva ādikāni sarva astrāṇi sādhayet

original: yadyadatraṃ sādhayet sa tena cihnena tattat kulavidyādharo bhavati kālacakrājñayeti
analyzed: yat yat atram sādhayet sa tena cihnena tat tat kula vidyādharaḥ bhavati kālacakra ājñayā iti

original: atha devatāniyamena siddharasavat saptāvarta milati, tadā sādhanaṃ vinā khecarāḥ siddhayo bhavanti, iti mūlatantre niyamaḥ |
analyzed: atha milati tadā bhavanti iti
iti gulikā ādi sādhana vidhiḥ

original: jīve dūte sajīve gaganadiśi gate dūta: praśno'samo yo bahusugvaphalado mṛtyumāpnoti daṣṭo mṛtyudoktaḥ samo yaḥ |
analyzed: jīve dūte sa jīve gagana diśi gate dūta samaḥ yaḥ mṛtyum āpnoti daṣṭaḥ samaḥ yaḥ

original: dūtaḥ sarpādināma pravadati hi tato mṛtyumāpnoti daṣṭaḥ pṛcchā prāṇapraveśe yadi bhavati śubhā nirgame sā'śubhā syāt || 171 ||
analyzed: dūtaḥ sarpa ādi nāma pravadati hi tatas mṛtyum āpnoti daṣṭaḥ pṛcchā prāṇapraveśe yadi bhavati śubhā nirgame sā śubhā syāt

original: dūto vāmāgrapāda: kathayati yuvatīṃ dakṣiṇāmro naraṃ ca svāṅga hastena yatra spṛśati sa manujo daṣṭamatra pradeśe |
analyzed: dūtaḥ vāma agra pāda kathayati yuvatīm dakṣiṇa āmraḥ naram ca sva aṅga hastena yatra spṛśati sa manujaḥ daṣṭam atra pradeśe

original: protphullaṃ netravaktraṃ kathayati maraṇaṃ karṇamūle ca kṛṣṇaḥ śabdo hṛtpuṇḍarīke yadi bhavati manāk saṃgrahaṃ tatra kuryāt || 172 ||
analyzed: protphullam netra vaktram kathayati maraṇam karṇa mūle ca kṛṣṇaḥ śabdaḥ hṛd puṇḍarīke yadi bhavati manāk saṃgraham tatra kuryāt

original: ādau rakṣāvidhānaṃ bhavati sukhakaraṃ daṣṭakasyātmanaśca pṛthvītoyā'gnivātā gaganamapi tathā'ṅguṣṭhakādau niyojya |
analyzed: ādau rakṣā vidhānam bhavati sukha karam daṣṭakasya ātmanaḥ ca pṛthvī toyāḥ gni vātāḥ gaganam api tathā ṅguṣṭhaka ādau niyojya

original: lādyā hāntāḥ krameṇorujaṭharahṛdaye vaktramadhye lalāṭe hū~kṣū hyahya| dināgā daśaviṣamasamā hrasvadīrghaprabhedeḥ ||173||
analyzed: la ādyāḥ ha antāḥ krameṇa ūru jaṭhara hṛdaye vaktra madhye lalāṭe hū dina āgāḥ daśa viṣama samāḥ

original: vāmāṅga hrasvabījaṃ śravaṇagalagataṃ kakṣa kukṣorudeśe savyāṅga dīrghameva prabhavati phaṇināṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārayogaiḥ |
analyzed: vāma aṅga hrasva bījam śravaṇa gala gatam kakṣa kukṣa ūru deśe savya aṅga dīrgham eva prabhavati phaṇinām sṛṣṭi saṃhāra yogaiḥ

original: rakṣāṃ kṛtvā jinākhyāṃ guḻasusamaśareṇāhibījānvitena huṃkṣūṃyuktena śīghraṃ sunihatahṛdayaḥ stobhamāyāti daṣṭaḥ || 174 |
analyzed: rakṣām kṛtvā jina ākhyām asu sama śareṇa ahi bīja anvitena huṃ kṣūṃ yuktena śīghram su nihata hṛdayaḥ stobham āyāti daṣṭaḥ

original: pṛthvībīje lalāṭe caraṇagatakhaje stambhamāyāti śīghraṃ toye mūrdhni praviṣṭe śikhini ca jaṭhare nirviṣatvaṃ prayāti |
analyzed: pṛthvī bīje lalāṭe caraṇa gata khaje stambham āyāti śīghram toye mūrdhni praviṣṭe śikhini ca jaṭhare nirviṣa tvam prayāti

original: vāyorbīje lalāṭe śikhini ca hṛdaye saṃkramo vai viṣasya śūnye mūrdhni praviṣṭe caraṇagatamaho chedanaṃ vai viṣasya || 175 ||
analyzed: vāyoḥ bīje lalāṭe śikhini ca hṛdaye saṃkramaḥ vai viṣasya śūnye mūrdhni praviṣṭe caraṇa gatam aho chedanam vai viṣasya

original: śveto bindurlalāṭe trividhamapi viṣaṃ nirviṣaṃ ve karoti raktaḥ stobhaṃ praveśaṃ kaṣaṇaghananibhaḥ stambhanaṃ pītavarṇaḥ vati prāṇapravāhe vimalaprabhāyāṃ trikaṭukalulitāṃ yojayenni viṣatve [ sādhanā- aṅgulyā lambikāyāṃ vikasitavadane ṭaṅgaṇaṃ yojayed vā || 176 ||
analyzed: śvetaḥ binduḥ lalāṭe trividham api viṣam nirviṣam karoti raktaḥ stobham praveśam kaṣaṇa ghana nibhaḥ stambhanam pīta varṇaḥ prāṇa pravāhe vimala prabhāyām trikaṭuka lulitām viṣa tve

original: vajrī jāti: kumārī trikaṭukalavaṇaṃ lāṅgalī devadālī brāhmī cāro'śvagandhā dinakarasahitā vandhyakarkoṭakī ca |
analyzed: vajrī jāti kumārī trikaṭuka lavaṇam lāṅgalī devadālī brāhmī cāro śvagandhā dinakarasahitā vandhyakarkoṭakī ca

original: viṇmāṃsaṃ śukraraktaṃ samamapi gulikā kāritā'kṣobhyapiṣṭā bhūtaṃ bhūtajvaraṃ vā sthiramuragaviṣaṃ ghrāṇadattā nihanti || 177||
analyzed: viṣ māṃsam śukra raktam samam api gulikā kāritā kṣobhya piṣṭā bhūtam bhūta jvaram vā sthiram uraga viṣam ghrāṇa dattā nihanti

original: sūryādī saptavāre dinaniśisamaye saptabhāgāvasāne śūnyā mandārkamadhye pravahati kulikā mṛtyurūpā'rdhanāḍī |
analyzed: sūrya ādī sapta vāre dina niśi samaye sapta bhāga avasāne śūnyā manda arka madhye pravahati kulikā mṛtyu rūpā rdha nāḍī

original: nāgakrīḍāṃ na kuryāt trividhamapi viṣaṃ bhakṣaṇīyaṃ na tatra tasyāmevāhidaṣṭo vrajati yamapuraṃ madhyāhne cārdharātre dina niśisamaye bhūtalabdho'strabhinnaḥ || 178 ||
analyzed: nāga krīḍām na kuryāt trividham api viṣam bhakṣaṇīyam na tatra tasyām eva ahi daṣṭaḥ vrajati yama puram madhyāhne ca ardharātre dina niśi samaye bhūta labdhaḥ stra bhinnaḥ

original: nityavāraprabhedāt śūnyāndho sandhimadhye pravahati kulikā kāladaṣṭekanāḍī |
analyzed: nitya vāra prabhedāt sandhi madhye pravahati kulikā kāla daṣṭā ika nāḍī

original: pratyūṣe'staṅgate'rke punarapi ca tathā kālanāḍī ca mṛtyo- retānyāsyāni rāhoḥ pratidinasamaye veditavyāni samyak || 179 ||
analyzed: pratyūṣe rke punar api ca tathā kālanāḍī ca mṛtyoḥ retāni āsyāni rāhoḥ prati dina samaye veditavyāni samyak

original: āditye'nantabhogo dinaniśisamaye cādibhāge dinasya paścāccheṣoragāṇāmudaya iha bhavet saptavāraprabhedāt |
analyzed: āditye nanta bhogaḥ dina niśi samaye ca ādi bhāge dinasya paścāt śeṣa uragāṇām udayaḥ iha bhavet sapta vāra prabhedāt

original: khartuḥ khacchidrakheṣuḥ khayugakhavasavaḥ khādrikhāgniśca nāḍyo bhogāḥ sūryādivārādapi vasuphaṇināṃ bhuktibhedād viṣaṃ syāt || 180 ||
analyzed: kha ṛtuḥ kha chidra kha iṣuḥ kha yuga kha vasavaḥ kha adri kha agniḥ ca nāḍyaḥ bhogāḥ sūrya ādi vārāt api vasu phaṇinām bhukti bhedāt viṣam syāt

original: vipro'nanto himābhaḥ kulika iti nṛpo vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālo rakto vaiśyo mahābjo varakana kanibhastakṣakastadvadeva |
analyzed: vipraḥ nantaḥ hima ābhaḥ kulikaḥ iti nṛpaḥ vāsukiḥ śaṅkhapālaḥ raktaḥ vaiśyaḥ mahā abjaḥ vara kanaka nibhaḥ takṣakaḥ tadvat eva

original: karkoṭako'bjaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibhaścāntyajau viśvavarṇau janmasthānaṃ ca teṣāṃ jalaśikhidharaṇīmārutākāśadhātuḥ || 181 ||
analyzed: karkoṭakaḥ bjaḥ kaṣaṇa ghana nibhaḥ ca antyajau viśva varṇau janma sthānam ca teṣām jala śikhi dharaṇī māruta ākāśa dhātuḥ

original: pādāt kaṭayantapīto garuḍa iti tathā nābhisīmno himābha ākaṇṭhād raktavarṇaḥ kaṣaṇaghananibho bhrūlatāṃ yāvadeva |
analyzed: pādāt kaṭayanta pītaḥ garuḍaḥ iti tathā nābhi sīmnaḥ hima ābhaḥ ā kaṇṭhāt rakta varṇaḥ kaṣaṇa ghana nibhaḥ bhrū latām yāvat eva

original: tasmādvai viśvavarṇaḥ phaṇikulasahito mudritaḥ pañcatattve - rdhyātastanmudrayā ve harati phaṇiviṣaṃ bhūtarogādikaṃ ca || 182 ||
analyzed: tasmāt vai viśva varṇaḥ phaṇi kula sahitaḥ mudritaḥ pañcatattve harati phaṇi viṣam bhūta roga ādikam ca

original: kāraṃ pakṣināthaṃ svahṛdayakamale bhāvayet sūryamūni nāgālaṅkārayuktaṃ sakalakulavaśāt pañcavarṇaṃ sphurantam |
analyzed: kāram pakṣi nātham sva hṛdaya kamale bhāvayet nāga alaṅkāra yuktam sakala kula vaśāt pañca varṇam sphurantam

original: pakṣisvāhāntamādi praṇavamapi tataḥ pakṣināthasya mantraṃ japtvā taṃ koṭimekaṃ phaṇikulasahitaṃ sādhayet pakṣinātham || 183||
analyzed: pakṣi svāhā antam ādi praṇavam api tatas pakṣināthasya mantram japtvā tam koṭim ekam phaṇi kula sahitam sādhayet pakṣinātham

original: tāyeṃ siddhe phaṇīndrāḥ phaṇipatitanayāḥ kiṅkaratvaṃ prayānti bhūtā yakṣā grahāśca pravarabhuvitale ḍākinīmātaraśca |
analyzed: siddhe phaṇi indrāḥ phaṇipati tanayāḥ kiṅkara tvam prayānti bhūtāḥ yakṣāḥ grahāḥ ca pravara bhuvi tale ḍākinī mātaraḥ ca

original: mantrākṛṣṭi prayānti grahagaṇasakalaṃ jalpate kāladaṣṭaḥ tasmāt sattvārthahetoḥ prathamamapi nareḥ sādhanīyaḥ khagendraḥ || 184 ||
analyzed: mantra ākṛṣṭi prayānti graha gaṇa sakalam jalpate kāla daṣṭaḥ tasmāt sattva artha hetoḥ prathamam api nareḥ sādhanīyaḥ khagendraḥ
tatas ekasaptati adhika śata vṛttāt gāruḍa vṛttāni su bodhāni
tena atra na vyākhyā tāni iti

original: idānīṃ śāntyādo yantrāṇyucyante- vedeṣvaṣṭau daleṣveva nṛpatiṣu radeṣvabdhiṣaṭsu dvijeṣu garbhe sādhya: svadikṣu prathamamapi yugaṃ yādayo'ṣṭo daleṣu |
analyzed: idānīm śānti ādaḥ yantrāṇi ucyante vedeṣu aṣṭau daleṣu eva nṛpatiṣu radeṣu abdhi ṣaṭsu dvijeṣu garbhe sādhya sva dikṣu prathamam api yugam daleṣu

original: eyādyāḥ ṣo ḍaśeṣu triguṇitadaśakāḥ kādihakṣā dvijeṣu sandhyāpatreṣu sādhyastithiguṇitayugeṣveva lāntā: samātrāḥ || 185 ||
analyzed: eya ādyāḥ ṣaḥ ḍaśeṣu tri guṇita daśakāḥ ka ādi hakṣāḥ dvijeṣu sandhyā patreṣu sādhyaḥ tithi guṇita yugeṣu eva lāntā samātrāḥ
vedeṣu ityādi

original: ihābhiṣekapaṭaloktanyagrodhapatrādike śrīkhaṇḍādinā śītādilekhanyā yantrāṇi lekhyāni śāntyādīni |
analyzed: iha abhiṣeka paṭala ukta nyagrodha patra ādike śrīkhaṇḍa ādinā śīta ādi lekhanyā yantrāṇi lekhyāni śānti ādīni

original: tatrāyaṃ kramaḥ - prathamaparimaṇḍale caturdalāni, dvitīye'ṣṭī, tṛtīye ṣoḍaśa, caturthe dvātriṃśat pañcame catuḥṣaṣṭhiḥ, ṣaṣṭhe dvātriṃśaditi |
analyzed: tatra ayam kramaḥ prathama parimaṇḍale catur dalāni dvitīye ṣṭī tṛtīye ṣoḍaśa caturthe dvātriṃśat pañcame ṣaṣṭhe dvātriṃśat iti

original: yathā śarīre uṣṇīṣe hṛdaye lalāṭe kaṇṭhe nābhau guhye ṣaṭcakrāṇi tathā yantralikhane ṣaṭ parimaṇḍa- lānīti |
analyzed: yathā śarīre uṣṇīṣe hṛdaye lalāṭe kaṇṭhe nābhau guhye ṣaṣ cakrāṇi tathā yantra likhane ṣaṣ parimaṇḍa iti
tatra catur dala madhye sādhya nāma

original: vedeṣviti caturdaleṣu dikṣu prathamam a aṃ yugmamiti |
analyzed: vedeṣu iti catur daleṣu dikṣu prathamam a aṃ yugmam iti
a pūrve aṃ uttare
ā paścime
aḥ dakṣiṇe
iti prathama parimaṇḍale
aṣṭābja pattreṣu iti aṣṭadaleṣu ya ādayaḥ
i ī pūrve gnau
ṛṛ yāmye nairṛtye
u ū uttara īśāne
la la paścime vāyavye
iti dvitīya parimaṇḍale

original: evaṃ nṛpatiṣviti tṛtīyaparimaṇḍale ṣoḍaśadaleṣu eyādyā iti pūrvādicaturdaleṣu e ai ya yā, dakṣiṇadaleṣu, ar ār ra rā uttaradaleṣu o au va vā, paścimadaleṣu al āl la lā |
analyzed: evam nṛpatiṣu iti tṛtīya parimaṇḍale ṣoḍaśa daleṣu iti pūrva ādi catur daleṣu dakṣiṇa daleṣu uttara daleṣu va vā paścima daleṣu al la lā
iti tṛtīye parimaṇḍale

original: radeṣviti dvātriṃśaddaleṣu triguṇitadaśakā iti triṃśat kādayo hamā iti dvijeṣviti
analyzed: radeṣu iti dvātriṃśat daleṣu tri guṇita daśakāḥ iti triṃśat ka ādayaḥ hamāḥ iti dvijeṣu iti

original: tatra pūrvādipañcadaleṣu ca cha ja jha ña, dakṣiṇapañcadaleṣu ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, uttare pa pha ba bha ma, paścime ta tha da dha na, evamīśānamārabhya pūrvapatre makārākṣaramārabhya patratraye ka kha ga vimalaprabhāyāṃ iti
analyzed: tatra pūrva ādi pañcadaleṣu ca cha ja jha ña dakṣiṇa pañcadaleṣu ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa uttare pa pha ba bha ma paścime ta tha da dha na evam īśānam ārabhya pūrva patre makāra akṣaram

original: 'āgneyādārabhya dakṣiṇe ñakārādārabhya patratraye gha ṅa cha iti
analyzed: āgneyāt ārabhya dakṣiṇe ñakārāt ārabhya patra traye gha ṅa cha iti

original: nairṛtyādārabhya paścime ṇakārādārabhya patratraye sa paṣa iti
analyzed: nairṛtyāt ārabhya paścime ṇakārāt ārabhya patra traye sa paṣaḥ iti

original: vāyavyādārabhya uttare nakārādārabhya patratrayeśa kaha iti
analyzed: vāyavyāt ārabhya uttare nakārāt ārabhya patra traya īśa ka haḥ iti
evam dvātriṃśat da leṣu iti caturtha parimaṇḍale
abdhi ṣaṭ su iti catuḥṣaṣṭi daleṣu iti sādhyaḥ

original: patreṣu cartaṣu pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime uttare sādhyanāma yathā, tathā madhye
analyzed: pattreṣu ca ṛtaṣu pūrve dakṣiṇe paścime uttare sādhya nāma yathā tathā madhye
evam pañca sthāneṣu sādhya nāma

original: tithiguṇitayugeṣviti ṣaṣṭidaleṣu yathāsaṃkhyaṃ lāntā: samātrā iti
analyzed: tithi guṇita yugeṣu iti ṣaṣṭi daleṣu yathāsaṃkhyam lāntā samātrāḥ iti

original: hayaravalā: samātrā dvādaśamātrāsahitāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ṣaṣṭida- leṣu tataḥ sādhyanāma pūrvādau dakṣiṇāvartena ya yā yi yī yū yṛ yu yū yūla ylu yaṃ yaḥ iti dvādaśadaleṣu tato dakṣiṇe sādhyanāmno ra rāri rī ru rū la la raṃ raḥ iti dvādaśadaleṣu
analyzed: samātrā dvādaśa mātrā sahitāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ṣaṣṭi da leṣu tatas sādhya nāma pūrva ādau dakṣiṇa āvartena yaṃ yaḥ iti dvādaśa daleṣu tatas dakṣiṇe sādhya nāmnaḥ ra rāri rī ru rū

original: uttare sādhyanāmno va vā vi vī vṛ vṛ vu vū vla vlu vaṃ vaḥ iti dvādaśadaleṣu
analyzed: uttare sādhya nāmnaḥ va vā vi vī vṛ vṛ vu vū vla vlu vaṃ vaḥ iti dvādaśa daleṣu

original: paścime sādhyanāmno lalā lilī ḷ ḹ lu lū lḷ llū laṃ la: iti dvādaśadaleṣviti
analyzed: paścime sādhya nāmnaḥ lalā lilī ḷ ḷ lu lū lḷ llū laṃ laḥ iti dvādaśa daleṣu iti

original: tataḥ pūrve sādhyasya aparapatre ha, paścime hā, uttare haiṃ, dakṣiṇe haḥ, evaṃ vāmāvartena hi hī īśānāntam, hu ha, agnyantam, huhū vāyavyantam, ha la hala nairṛtyāntamiti
analyzed: tatas pūrve sādhyasya apara patre ha paścime hā uttare haiṃ dakṣiṇe haḥ evam vāma āvartena hi hī īśāna antam hu ha agni antam huhū vāyavī antam ha la hala nairṛtya antam iti

original: sādhyasya nāmādyakṣaramiti kaṇikāyām dvitīyaṃ pūrve sandhyāpatre, tṛtīyaṃ dakṣiṇe, caturthamuttare, pañcamaṃ paścime
analyzed: sādhyasya nāma ādi akṣaram iti kaṇikāyām dvitīyam pūrve sandhyā patre tṛtīyam dakṣiṇe caturtham uttare pañcamam paścime

original: te' hū~ āḥ oṃ ho iti cittavākkāyajñānākṣarāṇi nāmādyakṣarasahitāni lekhyāni || 185 ||
analyzed: te hū āḥ om ho iti citta vāc kāya jñāna akṣarāṇi nāma ādi akṣara sahitāni lekhyāni

original: ādyekaikasvarābhyāṃ makaraghaṭavaśād dīrghahasvāśca pañca dvātriṃśad bāhyapatreṣvapi samahṛdayā vajratīkṣṇādivarṇāḥ
analyzed: ādi eka eka svarābhyām makara ghaṭa vaśāt dīrgha hasvāḥ ca pañca dvātriṃśat bāhya patreṣu api sama hṛdayāḥ vajra tīkṣṇa ādi varṇāḥ

original: bāhye śāntyādikarmaṇyapi ca vayaralā maṇḍalānyeva teṣāṃ varṇā garbhottamāṅgāḥ śikhicalacaraṇā vaśya ākarṣaṇe ca ||186||
analyzed: bāhye śānti ādi karmaṇi api ca maṇḍalāni eva teṣām varṇāḥ garbha uttamāṅgāḥ śikhicala caraṇāḥ vaśye ākarṣaṇe ca
atha ādi eka eka svarābhyām makara ghaṭa vaśāt do ghaṃ ha svāḥ ca pañca iti

original: iha makarādi- lagneṣvadhidevā: kā khā gā ghāṅā ityādayaḥ
analyzed: iha makara ādi lagneṣu adhidevā kā khā gā ghāṅā ityādayaḥ

original: pūrve sādhyacittākṣarasya dakṣiṇāvartena cā chā jā jhātrā mone, tathā tra jhaja cha ceti meṣe, evaṃ daśapatreṣu
analyzed: pūrve sādhya citta akṣarasya dakṣiṇa āvartena cā chā jā jhā trā mone tathā tra jha ja cha ca iti meṣe evam daśa patreṣu

original: tathā dakṣiṇe vāgvajrasya ṭādayo daśa, uttare kāyavajrasya yādayo daśa, paścime jñānavajrasya tādayo daśa, śeṣadaleṣu viṃśatiṣu paścime pañcadaleṣu kādayaḥ pañca dīrghāḥ, pūrve ṅādaya pañca hasvāḥ, dakṣiṇe sādayaḥ pañca dīrghāḥ, uttare kādayaḥ pañca hrasvāḥ, evaṃ ṣaṣṭivarṇāḥ pañcame parimaṇḍale
analyzed: tathā dakṣiṇe vāgvajrasya ṭādayaḥ daśa uttare kāyavajrasya yādayaḥ daśa paścime jñānavajrasya tādayaḥ daśa śeṣa daleṣu viṃśatiṣu paścime pañcadaleṣu kādayaḥ pañca dīrghāḥ pūrve
dvātriṃśat bāhya patreṣu iti

original: iha guhyakamale dvātriṃśaddala viśuddhayā dvātriṃśatpatre jg ṣaṣṭhe parimaṇḍale'pi samahṛdayā vajratīkṣṇādivarṇā iti
analyzed: iha guhya kamale dvātriṃśat dala viśuddhayā dvātriṃśat pattre ṣaṣṭhe parimaṇḍale sama hṛdayāḥ vajra tīkṣṇa ādi varṇāḥ iti

original: tadyathā 'vajratīkṣṇa duḥkhacheda' iti īśānamārabhyāgneyaparyantam, tato dakṣiṇe 'prajñājñānamūrtaye' iti, tathā paścime kāyavāgīśvara a iti
analyzed: tat yathā vajratīkṣṇa duḥkha chedaḥ iti īśānam ārabhya āgneya paryantam tatas dakṣiṇe prajñā jñāna mūrtaye iti tathā paścime kāya vāc īśvara iti

original: tathā uttare 'arapacanāya te namaḥ' iti vajratīkṣṇādivarṇāḥ
analyzed: tathā uttare arapacanāya te namaḥ iti vajra tīkṣṇa ādi varṇāḥ

original: evaṃ ṣaṭcakrātmakaṃ yantraṃ likhitvā abhiṣekapaṭaloktavidhinā bāhye śāntyādikarmaṇyapi ca vayaralā maṇḍalānyeva teṣāmiti
analyzed: evam ṣaṭcakra ātmakam yantram likhitvā abhiṣeka paṭala ukta vidhinā bāhye śānti ādi karmaṇi api ca maṇḍalāni eva teṣām iti
idam yantram śānti puṣṭau jvara apaharaṇe nirviṣīkaraṇe
udaka maṇḍalena yantram veṣṭayet vakāreṇa vā
tatas candra maṇḍala madhye kṣipet hasti madhye vā

original: evaṃ māraṇādye vāyumaṇḍalena, vaśyādye tejomaṇḍalena, stambhanādye pṛthivīmaṇḍalena veṣṭayet
analyzed: evam māraṇa ādye vāyu maṇḍalena vaśyā ādye tejaḥ maṇḍalena stambhana ādye pṛthivī maṇḍalena veṣṭayet
śeṣam abhiṣeka paṭala uktam kartavyam iti

original: iha yantre varṇā garbhottamāṅgā iti garbhaśiraso lekhyā:

śikhi cala caraṇāḥ iti dakṣiṇa caraṇāḥ
sarveṣām meruḥ uttara sthaḥ

original: śāntyādau garbhapādāḥ śikhicalaśiraso mantriṇā lekhanīyā: pūrvokta: śāntipuṣṭi bhuvana nidhanatoccāṭanā kṛṣṭivaśyam
analyzed: śānti ādau garbha pādāḥ śikhicala śirasaḥ mantriṇā lekhanīyā

original: sastambhaṃ mohanaṃ ca tribhuvananilaye cakrametat karoti jāpairhomaiśca sādhyaḥ prathamamiha mahāvajratīkṣṇādimantraḥ || 187||
analyzed: sa stambham mohanam ca tribhuvana nilaye cakram etat karoti jāpaiḥ homaiḥ ca sādhyaḥ prathamam iha mahā vajra tīkṣṇa ādi mantraḥ

original: tathā śāntyādau garbhapādā iti uttarapādā mevaṃbhimukhāḥ
analyzed: tathā śānti ādau garbha pādāḥ iti uttara pādāḥ

analyzed: evam māraṇa ādye pūrva caraṇāḥ paścima śirasaḥ stambhana ādye pūrva śirasaḥ paścima caraṇāḥ iti

original: pratyeka patre lekhanīyā mantriṇā pūrvoktaṃrityādi subodha iti ṣaṭcakrayantra niyamaḥ || 187 ||
analyzed: pratyeka patre lekhanīyā mantriṇā iti ṣaṭcakrayantra niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ yamāntakayantramucyate- aṣṭāre dvādaśāre diśividiśigataṃ ṣoḍaśāre'ntare ca sādhya: koṇeṣu madhye prabhavati yamarājāsadomeruṇādyo
analyzed: idānīm yamāntakayantram ucyate aṣṭa āre dvādaśa are diśi vidiśi gatam ṣoḍaśa are ntare ca sādhya koṇeṣu madhye prabhavati

original: tasmād garbhāramadhyād bhavati danirayakṣecca tasmānnirante oṃ hoḥ ṣṭrīḥ tasya bāhye bhavati ca vikṛtādānanād hū~ dvidhā phaṭ || 188 ||

aṣṭāraḥ ityādi
iha nyagrodha pattra ādau yantram lekhanīyam
prathama parimaṇḍalam aṣṭa aram dvitīyam dvādaśa aram tṛtīyam ṣoḍaśa aram iti

original: tatrāṣṭāreṣu viśividiśigatamiti diśi yamādyakṣaraṃ gatam, vidiśi patre sādhyanāmākṣaraṃ gatam, ṣoḍaśāre cāntarāntara- daleṣvaṣṭasviti
analyzed: tatra aṣṭa āreṣu viśi vidiśi gatam iti diśi yama ādi akṣaram gatam vidiśi patre sādhya nāma akṣaram gatam ṣoḍaśāre ca antara antara daleṣu aṣṭasu iti
evam sādhyaḥ koṇeṣu

original: prathamaparimaṇḍale madhye kaṇikāyāṃ prabhavati ya pūrve, ma dvādaśāre pūrve rā, dvitīye jā, tṛtīye sa, caturthe patre do prathamāṣṭāre
analyzed: prathama parimaṇḍale madhye kaṇikāyām prabhavati pūrve ma dvādaśa are pūrve rā dvitīye jā tṛtīye sa caturthe patre prathama aṣṭa are
dakṣiṇe me
punar dvādaśa are

analyzed: aṣṭame ni navame ra daśame ya

original: tathāha - yama rājā sa do me ya ya me do ru ṇa yo da ya
yada yo ni ra ya kṣe ya ya kṣe ya cca nirāmaya || iti mūlatantre
analyzed: ni ra ya kṣe ya ya kṣe ya cca nirāmayaḥ iti mūlatantre
eka adhipatinā ṣoḍaśa akṣarāṇi ṣoḍaśa daleṣu

original: evaṃ madhye prabhavati yamarājāsadomeruṇādyo tasmād garbhāramadhyād bhavati danirayakṣenca tasmānniranta iti
analyzed: evam madhye prabhavati tasmāt garbha āra madhyāt bhavati tasmāt niḥ antaḥ iti
aṣṭāre dvādaśāre niyamaḥ

original: tataḥ ṣoḍaśāre sādhyanāmāntarāntare patre idaṃ mantraṃ likhet — oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭrīḥ vikṛtānana huṃ huṃ phaṭ iti || 188 ||
analyzed: tatas ṣoḍaśāre sādhya nāma antara antare patre idam mantram likhet om hrīḥ ṣṭrīḥ vikṛta ānana hum hum phaṭ iti

original: - evaṃ kakṣāntarāle bhavati narapate sādhyanāmeṣa mantro vidveṣe mṛtyuvaśye prabhavati ya ma rā kṣeda me do sa cādyāḥ
analyzed: evam kakṣa antarāle bhavati narapate sādhya nāmā iṣa mantraḥ vidveṣe mṛtyu vaśye prabhavati

original: stambhākṛṣṭau ca mohe'pi ca balakaraṇe śāntikoccāṭane ca garbhāt tasmin yakāro vrajati guṇavaśāt pūrvavadvāhya sarvam || 189 ||
analyzed: stambha ākṛṣṭau ca mohe ca bala karaṇe śāntika uccāṭane ca garbhāt tasmin yakāraḥ vrajati guṇa vaśāt pūrvavat vāhya sarvam

original: evaṃ kakṣāntarāle bhavati narapate sādhyanāmaiṣa mantro vidveṣe mṛtyuvaśye iti
analyzed: evam kakṣa antarāle bhavati narapate sādhya nāmā eṣa mantraḥ vidveṣe mṛtyu vaśye iti

original: iha madhye'dhidevo vidveṣe ya, mṛtyo ma, vaśye rā prabhavati
analyzed: iha madhye dhidevaḥ vidveṣe ya mṛtyo ma vaśye rā prabhavati

original: tathā kṣe da me do sa cādyā iti
analyzed: tathā kṣe da me do sa ca ādyāḥ iti

original: iha stambhane kṣe, ākṛṣṭau da, mohane me, balakaraṇe do, śāntau sa, uccāṭane cca, jvara- karaṇe ṇa, stobhane rū, jaye jā, santāpaśamane yo, śatrunivāraṇe ni iti
analyzed: iha stambhane ākṛṣṭau da mohane me bala karaṇe do śāntau sa uccāṭane cca jvara karaṇe stobhane rū jaye santāpa śamane śatru nivāraṇe ni iti
garbhāt tasmin yakāraḥ vrajati guṇa vaśau iti

original: iha karmaṇaḥ svabhāvāt yo varṇo garbhe'dhipatirbhavati, tasya sthāne yakāro likhyate
analyzed: iha karmaṇaḥ svabhāvāt yaḥ varṇaḥ garbhe dhipatiḥ bhavati tasya sthāne yakāraḥ likhyate

original: idānīṃ mañjuśrīyantramucyate- varṇānāmuttamāṅgāt prabhavati purato maḥ svarāliṅgitaśca varṇairvagantavarṇaḥ kuliśakulavaśāt pañcamo'haṃ sa uktaḥ

original: prajñā bindudvayena svaraparamapuṭe syādiyaṃ me'pyukāro maṃ muḥ haṃ huśca saṃsuḥ kamalavasudale mañjurevāpatre || 190||

iha varṇānām uttamāṅgāt iti varṇānām śirasi binduḥ

original: tasmādutta- māṅgāt prabhavati purato maḥ svarāliṅgitaśceti
analyzed: tasmāt maḥ svara āliṅgitaḥ ca iti
akāra svareṇa āliṅgitaḥ nusvāraḥ makāraḥ bhavati

original: anyacca varṇaiḥ kakārādyairāliṅgito vargānta iti ṅa ñaṇa mana no bhavanti
analyzed: anyat ca varṇaiḥ kakāra ādyaiḥ āliṅgitaḥ varga antaḥ iti ṅa ña ṇa ma na naḥ bhavanti
kuliśa kula vaśāt pañcamaḥ ham saḥ uktaḥ
atas binduḥ aham

original: prajñā bindudvayena visargeṇa svaraparamapuṭe'kāradvayamadhye syādiyaṃ me'pyukāraḥ
analyzed: prajñā bindu dvayena visargeṇa svara parama puṭe kāra dvaya madhye syāt iyam me pi ukāraḥ

original: evaṃ maṃ ityupāyo muriti prajñā, evaṃ haṃ huḥ saṃ suḥ mañjurityaṣṭākṣarāṇi daleṣvaṣṭasu
analyzed: evam maṃ iti upāyaḥ muḥ iti prajñā evam haṃ huḥ sam suḥ mañjuḥ iti aṣṭa akṣarāṇi daleṣu aṣṭasu
dvitīye dvādaśa are parimaṇḍale eva arka patre iti

original: bāhye śrīvajraghoṣaḥ prabhavati sayuto mantabhadro'pi hū~ phaṭ sādhyo'smin kaṇikāyāṃ amukamapi kuru codanaṃ śrīsamādeḥ

original: evaṃ pūrvoktacakreṣvapi bhavati sadā lekhanaṃ sādhyanāmnaḥ etatsavaṃ narāṇāṃ jinapativacasā siddhayate me prasādāt || 191 ||

analyzed: evam pūrva ukta cakreṣu api bhavati sadā lekhanam sādhya nāmnaḥ

analyzed: etat sarvam narāṇām jinapati vacasā me prasādāt iti

analyzed: yaḥ śabdaḥ hṛd pradeśe bhavati vara nṛṇām śrūyate śrotra randhre tasmin cittam narasya vrajati samarasam yojitam ca eka bhūtam

original: yaṃ śabdaṃ jīvaloke vadati ca bhavajastattadeva śṛṇoti vijñānaṃ caiva dūrācchravaṇamapi vibhoryoginā bhāvanīyam ||192||

original: kṛtvā paryaṃṅkabandhaṃ vikasitavadano'nyonyadantaṃ spṛśenna ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātastadamṛtasahito nābhimadhye praviṣṭaḥ |

original: santāpaṃ kṣutpipāsāṃ harati varatanau sanniruddho viṣaṃ ca śveto bindulalāṭe svaraparikarito muñcamāno'mṛtaṃ vā || 193||
analyzed: santāpam kṣudh pipāsām harati vara tanau san niruddhaḥ viṣam ca śvetaḥ bindu lalāṭe svara parikaritaḥ muñcamānaḥ mṛtam vā

original: ghrāṇe randhradvayena tvapi pihitamukhe bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇenākṛṣya vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito'pānavāyuḥ |
analyzed: ghrāṇe randhra dvayena tu api pihita mukhe bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇena ākṛṣya vegāt taḍit anala nibhaḥ pāna vāyuḥ

original: kālenābhyāsayogād vrajati samarasaṃ candrasūryāgnimadhye annādyaṃ kṣutpipāsāmapaharati tano cāmaratvaṃ dadāti || 194 ||

original: svacchāyāmātapasthāmapara mukhara ve ṣaṇmāsābhyāsayogādava nigatanidhi stabdhadṛṣṭaghāvalokya paścādvayomābhivīkṣyet samarasapuruṣo dṛśyate dhūmravarṇaḥ |
analyzed: svacchāyām ātapa sthām apara mukhara nigata nidhi stabdha dṛṣṭa gha avalokya samarasa puruṣaḥ dṛśyate dhūmra varṇaḥ

original: darśayed bhūmi chidraṃ vṛkṣacchāyāṃ praviśya tvatha gaganatale bhāvitā bindumālā || 195 ||

analyzed: yā śaktiḥ nābhi madhyāt vrajati para padam dvādaśāntam kalā antam sā nābhau sat niruddhā taḍit anala nibhā daṇḍa rūpa utthitā ca

original: a. 'Z……'qfefa' arfea i vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ sādhanā- cakrāccatrāntaraṃ ve mṛdulalitagatiścālitā madhyanāḍyāṃ yāvaccoṣṇīṣarandhraṃ spṛśati haṭhatayā sūcivad bāhyacamaṃ || 196 ||
analyzed: vimala prabhāyām sādhanā mṛdu lalita gatiḥ cālitā madhyanāḍyām yāvat ca uṣṇīṣa randhram spṛśati haṭha tayā sūci vat

original: mudrā māyānurūpā manasi ca āpānaṃ ta kāle paramahaṭhatayā prerayedūrdhvamārge uṣṇīṣaṃ bhedayitvā vrajati varapuraṃ vāyuyugme niruddhe |
analyzed: mudrā māyā anurūpā manasi ca kāle parama haṭha tayā prerayet ūrdhva mārge uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā vrajati vara puram vāyu yugme niruddhe

original: evaṃ vajrapra[307b]bhedānmanasi saviṣayāt khecaratvaṃ prayāti pañcābhijñāsvabhāvā bhavati punariyaṃ yogināṃ viśvamātā || 197 ||
analyzed: evam bhedāt manasi sa viṣayāt khecara tvam prayāti pañca abhijñā svabhāvā bhavati punar iyam yoginām viśva mātā

original: gagane rūpavaddarpaṇe ca trailokyaṃ bhāsayantī taḍidanalanibhā'nekaraśmīn sphurantī |
analyzed: gagane rūpavat darpaṇe ca trailokyam bhāsayantī taḍit anala nibhā neka raśmīn sphurantī

original: bāhye deheṣvabhinnā viṣayavirahitā bhāsamānā'mbarasthā cittaṃ ceto mayā''liṅgayati ca jagato'nekarūpasya saikā || 198 ||
analyzed: bāhye deheṣu abhinnā viṣaya virahitā bhāsamānā mbara sthā cittam cetaḥ mayā liṅgayati ca jagataḥ neka rūpasya sā ekā

original: tyaktvemāṃ karmamudrāṃ sakaluṣahṛdayāṃ kalpitāṃ jñānamudrāṃ samyak saṃbodhihetojinavarajananīṃ bhāvayed divyamudrām |
analyzed: tyaktvā imām karma mudrām sa kaluṣa hṛdayām kalpitām jñāna mudrām samyak saṃbodhi hetoḥ jina vara jananīm bhāvayet divya mudrām

original: nirlepāṃ nirvikārāṃ khasamahatatamāṃ vyāpinīṃ yogigamyāṃ kūṭasthāṃ jñānatejāṃ bhavakaluṣaharāṃ kālacakrānuviddhām || 199||

original: vijñānaṃ nāṇurūpaṃ tribhava iha tathā nāsti vijñānameva buddhaprajñā sthitā na kvaciditi vacanaṃ deśayiṣyanti bauddhāḥ |
analyzed: vijñānam na aṇu rūpam tri bhave iha tathā nā asti vijñānam eva buddha prajñā sthitā na kvacid iti vacanam deśayiṣyanti bauddhāḥ

original: śūnyaṃ yāsyanti yenākṣara rahitanarāḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ gṛhītvā bhartrā tenācyutaṃ yatsahajatanusukhaṃ deśitaṃ mantrayāne || 200 ||

original: gokhaṅgāśvebhanāthān vraja tanuviṣayānindriyaṃ yatte śuddhāsi caitadviṣamaviṣayiṇāṃ jñānayoge yajñakāle nirodhaḥ |
analyzed: go khaṅga aśva ibha nāthān vraja tanu viṣayān indriyam yat te śuddhā asi ca etat viṣama viṣayiṇām jñāna yoge yajña kāle nirodhaḥ

original: yatpānaṃ dīkṣitānāṃ bhavati sarudhiraṃ go'jine somavallyā mūghnaṃ somāmṛtaṃ tad bhagarajasi gataṃ sarvagānandarūpam || 201 ||
analyzed: yat pānam dīkṣitānām bhavati sa rudhiram gaḥ jine somavallyāḥ mū ghnam soma amṛtam tat bhaga rajasi gatam sarvaga ānanda rūpam

original: brahmā kāyo haro vāg harirapi ca manaḥ prāṇināṃ te trivedā (devā) oṃkāraste trivarṇāḥ śaśiravihutabhuk te trināḍyo guṇāśca |
analyzed: brahmā kāyaḥ haraḥ vāc hariḥ api ca manaḥ prāṇinām te tri vedāḥ devāḥ oṃkāraḥ te tri varṇāḥ śaśiḥ avihutabhuj te tri nāḍyaḥ guṇāḥ ca

original: kaula: kāye kulānyo viṣayaguṇagato'tharvaṇo nādarūpī tanmadhye'nāhataṃ yadviṣayavirahitaṃ nirguṇaṃ cākṣaraṃ tat || 202 ||
analyzed: tharvaṇaḥ nāda rūpī tad madhye na āhatam yat viṣaya virahitam nirguṇam ca akṣaram tat

original: paṭale, 196-209 ślo. ] nānā sādhanamahoddeśaḥ vedānte guhyametat kathitamapi purā brahmaṇā yogināṃ vai kālājjñānapraṇaṣṭermunibhiriha vadho deśita: prāṇināṃ ca |
analyzed: paṭale nānā sādhana mahā uddeśaḥ vedānte guhyam etat kathitam api purā brahmaṇā yoginām vai kālāt jñāna praṇaṣṭeḥ munibhiḥ iha vadhaḥ prāṇinām ca

original: jātā [ 3084 ] tasmin pravṛttiḥ kuna ra kaphaladā svargahetornī rāṇā- maṅgāro nenduvarṇaḥ kvacidiha hi bhavet kṣīradhārābhiṣiktaḥ || 203||
analyzed: jātā tasmin pravṛttiḥ svarga hetoḥ nī maṅgāraḥ na indu varṇaḥ kvacid iha hi bhavet kṣīra dhārā abhiṣiktaḥ

original: niryogairvedavākyaiḥ samayavirahite vañcitā ye narāste rakṣāṃ kṛtvā svanāryā dinaniśisamaye svātmaputrārjanārtham |

original: dānaṃ putreṇa dattaṃ bhavati kila pituḥ pretalokaṃ gatasya tenedaṃ kāmadānaṃ śa ( sa ) masukhaphaladaṃ gopitaṃ duṣṭavipraiḥ || 204 ||
analyzed: dānam putreṇa dattam bhavati kila pituḥ preta lokam gatasya tena idam kāma dānam gopitam duṣṭa vipraiḥ

original: jātyaśve nānyapuṃso yadi bhavati mahāghoṭikāyāṃ mahāśvo lakṣmīścāśvaprabhāvāt punarapi ca bhavet svāminaḥ kinna lābhaḥ |

original: rakṣāṃ kurvanti yena pratidinasamaye rāgiṇaḥ svasvanāryāḥ kastvaṃ kā te svanārī maraṇamupagate'ho'śubhaḥ karmabandhaḥ || 205 ||
analyzed: rakṣām kurvanti yena prati dina samaye rāgiṇaḥ sva sva nāryāḥ kaḥ tvam kā te sva nārī maraṇam upagate ho śubhaḥ karma bandhaḥ

original: godānaṃ bhūmidānaṃ hyaparamapi tathā bhogadaṃ martyaloke bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ sakalarujaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāharaṃ ca |
analyzed: go dānam bhūmi dānam hi aparam api tathā bhoga dam martya loke bhaiṣajya āhāra dānam sakala ruja haram kṣudh pipāsā haram ca

original: sarvasmin kāmadānaṃ śa ( sa ) masukhaphaladaṃ ki punaścakakāle iṣṭā bhāryā bhaginyapi subhagaduhitā guhyadāne pradeyā || 206 ||
analyzed: sarvasmin kāma dānam punar iṣṭā bhāryā bhaginī api subhaga duhitā guhya dāne pradeyā

original: sadveśyā karmamudrā bhavati ca samayā guptanārī parastrī svacchandā dharmamudrā bahuviṣayaratā jñānamudrā svabhāryā |

original: sadveśyā dvādaśābdā paramasukharatā ṣoḍaśābdā kulastrī svacchandā viśadabdā bhavati svaduhitā triśadabdā svabhāryā ||207||
analyzed: sat veśyā dvādaśa abdā parama sukha ratā ṣoḍaśa abdā kula strī svacchandā viśat abdā bhavati sva duhitā triśat abdā sva bhāryā

original: pūrvaṃ buddherdharitrī gajaturagarathānekasauvarṇabhāvā dattā buddhatvahetoḥ punarapi ca śiro raktamāṃsaṃ pradattam |
analyzed: pūrvam buddheḥ dharitrī gaja turaga ratha aneka sauvarṇa bhāvā dattā buddhatva hetoḥ punar api ca śiraḥ rakta māṃsam pradattam

original: ebhirbuddhatvamiṣṭaṃ nahi bhavati tataḥ kāmadānaṃ pradattaṃ buddhatvaṃ tena jātaṃ jinajanakakule guhyadānena puṃsām ||208 ||
analyzed: ebhiḥ buddha tvam iṣṭam nahi bhavati tatas kāma dānam pradattam buddha tvam tena jātam jina janaka kule guhya dānena puṃsām

original: hemaṃ tāmra eṇa tulyaṃ suramukuṭamaṇiḥ kācakhaṇḍena tulyaḥ sadveśyā kāmadāne ramala kulavadhūścarma khaṇḍena nābhiḥ vimalaprabhāyāṃ jātyaśvo gardabhena pravaragajapatirlabhyate yadyajena bhāryādānena devo jinajanakakule tatra kiṃ neṣa lābhaḥ || 209 ||
analyzed: hemam tāmraḥ tulyam sura mukuṭa maṇiḥ kāca khaṇḍena tulyaḥ sat veśyā kāma dāne kula vadhūḥ carma khaṇḍena nābhiḥ vimalaprabhāyām jātyaśvaḥ gardabhena pravara gaja patiḥ labhyate yadi

original: maitrī sthāne na dānaṃ śa ( sa ) ma sukhaphaladaṃ tulya sattvaprabhāvāt sūpekṣāsthāna evaṃ pravarajina kule mārasattvaprabhāvāt |
analyzed: maitrī sthāne na dānam sukha phala dam sattva prabhāvāt su upekṣā sthāne evam kule māra sattva prabhāvāt

original: hīnatvāduttamatvāt sakaruṇamuditāsthānayugme pradattaḥ (ttau ) saṃbhāro dvo prapūryākṣarasukhaphaladaṃ saugatānāṃ parārtham || 210 ||
analyzed: hīna tvāt uttama tvāt sa karuṇa mudita āsthāna yugme pradattaḥ saṃbhāraḥ prapūrya akṣara sukha phala dam saugatānām para artham

original: varṇo yasya pramāṇaṃ bhavati narapate tasya veda [ : ] pramāṇaṃ vedo yasya pramāṇaṃ khalu bhuvi nilaye tasya yajña [ : ] pramāṇam |
analyzed: varṇaḥ yasya pramāṇam bhavati narapate tasya veda pramāṇam vedaḥ yasya pramāṇam khalu bhuvi nilaye tasya yajña pramāṇam

original: yajño yasya pramāṇaṃ vividhapaśunṛṇāṃ tasya hiṃsā pramāṇaṃ hiṃsā yasya pramāṇaṃ narakabhayakaraṃ tasya pāpaṃ pramāṇam || 211 ||
analyzed: yajñaḥ yasya pramāṇam vividha paśu nṛṇām tasya hiṃsā pramāṇam hiṃsā yasya pramāṇam naraka bhaya karam tasya pāpam pramāṇam

original: vāsagrāsārthamiṣṭāṃ kathayati bhagavān śrīvihārapratiṣṭhāṃ bhaiṣajyāhāradānaṃ kila rujaśamanaṃ tatra dātā dadāti |
analyzed: vāsa grāsa artham iṣṭām kathayati bhagavān śrī vihāra pratiṣṭhām bhaiṣajya āhāra dānam kila ruja śamanam tatra dātā dadāti

original: dānābhāve vihāraḥ kṣititalanilaye tiryagāvāsa eṣa grāso yatraiva saṃgho bhavati narapate tatra buddhaśca dharmaḥ || 212 ||
analyzed: dāna abhāve vihāraḥ kṣiti tala nilaye tiryak āvāsaḥ eṣa grāsaḥ yatra eva saṃghaḥ bhavati narapate tatra buddhaḥ ca dharmaḥ

original: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ śaraṇamanugatā mānuṣā mokṣaheto- nayaṃ buddha vihāre sthita iha likhita pustako dharma eva |
analyzed: buddham dharmam ca saṃgham śaraṇam anugatāḥ mānuṣāḥ mokṣa hetoḥ nayam buddha vihāre sthitaḥ iha likhita pustakaḥ dharmaḥ eva

original: saṃghaḥ kāṣāyadhārī paramavibhusukhaṃ janmalakṣerdadāti ācāryo buddha eva pravarabhavitale deśanā tasya dharmaḥ || 213 ||
analyzed: saṃghaḥ kāṣāya dhārī parama vibhu sukham janma lakṣeḥ dadāti ācāryaḥ buddhaḥ eva pravara bhavi tale deśanā tasya dharmaḥ

original: saṃghastasmin sthito yaḥ pramudita hṛdayaḥ sarvasattvānukampī so'sminnuktaścaturdhā dvividha iha punaḥ śrāvako'nuttaraśca |
analyzed: saṃghaḥ tasmin sthitaḥ yaḥ hṛdayaḥ sarva sattva anukampī saḥ smin uktaḥ caturdhā dvividhaḥ iha punar śrāvakaḥ nuttaraḥ ca

original: bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣavaścāpi punariha mahopāsakopāsikāśca yoginyo yogino ve sahajasukharatopāsakopāsikāśca || 214 ||
analyzed: bhikṣuṇyaḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca api punar iha mahā upāsaka upāsikāḥ ca yoginyaḥ yoginaḥ sahaja sukha rata upāsaka upāsikāḥ ca

original: puṇyajñānārthahetorvividhamapi sadā dānamatyarthamiṣṭaṃ bhojyādyaṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ paramasukhakaraṃ yogināmiṣṭadānam |
analyzed: puṇya jñāna artha hetoḥ vividham api sadā dānam atyartham iṣṭam bhojya ādyam śrāvakebhyaḥ parama sukha karam yoginām iṣṭa dānam

original: dātāro ye dadanti pramudita hṛdayāḥ savaṃdā raktacittā- ste puṇyajñānapūrṇāḥ paramasukhapadaṃ janmanīha vrajanti || 215 ||
analyzed: dātāraḥ ye dadanti hṛdayāḥ rakta cittāḥ ste puṇya jñāna pūrṇāḥ parama sukha padam janmani iha vrajanti

original: paṭale, ślo. ] nānāsādhanamahoddeśaḥ ācāryaṃ nindayanti prakaṭamapi jinaṃ śrāvakā ye'prabuddhā- ste'avīci yānti śīghraṃ paramabhayakaraṃ māritā vighnanātheḥ |
analyzed: paṭale nānā sādhana mahoddeśaḥ ācāryam nindayanti prakaṭam api jinam śrāvakāḥ ye prabuddhāḥ ste avīci yānti śīghram param abhaya karam māritāḥ vighnanātheḥ

original: svādhiṣṭhānaṃ karoti pravarajinapatiryasya mantraprabhāvaiḥ ko bhikṣustasya tulyo vrataniyamapade brahmacārī narāṇām || 216 ||
analyzed: svādhiṣṭhānam karoti pravara jinapatiḥ yasya mantra prabhāvaiḥ kaḥ bhikṣuḥ tasya tulyaḥ vrata niyama pade brahmacārī narāṇām

original: kaṣṭaṃ kurvanti sarve paramasukharatā bhikṣuko vā parivrāḍ nagno mauṇḍī jaṭī ca śrutapaṭhanarataḥ paṇḍito māgaṃnaṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: kaṣṭam kurvanti sarve parama sukha ratāḥ bhikṣukaḥ vā parivrāj nagnaḥ mauṇḍī jaṭī ca śruta paṭhana rataḥ paṇḍitaḥ
kartuḥ ca ātma graheṇa sva param iha sadā putra dāra graheṇa bhakṣya abhakṣya graheṇa api a kula kula rata a pātra pātra graheṇa

original: buddhakṣetraṃ samastaṃ śa ( sa ) masukhaphaladaṃ kāyavākcittarāgaṃ etatsaṃhārayitvā tvaparamapi vibhuṃ pāpabuddhiḥ samīkṣet |
analyzed: buddhakṣetram samastam kāya vāc citta rāgam etat saṃhārayitvā tu aparam api vibhum pāpa buddhiḥ samīkṣet

original: kṣetre tīrthe'nyadeśe vrataniyamalaṅghanaiḥ śailapāteḥ saṃgrāme grastasūrye grastasūrye viṣayasukharato'nekaśastrāgnidhāteḥ ||218||
analyzed: kṣetre tīrthe nya deśe vrata niyama laṅghanaiḥ śaila pāteḥ saṃgrāme grasta sūrye grasta sūrye viṣaya sukha rataḥ neka śastra agni dhāteḥ

original: mārairetatsamastaṃ racitamapi purā raktapānasya hetoḥ svargastīrthopavāsemaṃ raṇamupagatasyāhatasyaiva yuddhe |
analyzed: māraiḥ etat samastam racitam api purā rakta pānasya hetoḥ svargaḥ tīrtha upavāsa imam raṇam upagatasya ahatasya eva yuddhe

original: gobbhānormocanārthe gṛhadhanaviṣaye viprakārye mṛtasya tasmādeṣaḥ svakāyaḥ samasukhanilayo rakṣaṇīyaḥ parasya || 219 ||
analyzed: gobbhānoḥ mocana arthe gṛha dhana viṣaye viprakārye mṛtasya tasmāt eṣaḥ sva kāyaḥ sama sukha nilayaḥ rakṣaṇīyaḥ parasya

original: śrutvā yastantra rāje jinavaracaritaṃ cābhiṣekaṃ gṛhītvā īrṣyā bhūyaḥ karoti praviśati narakaṃ so'ṣṭamaṃ yāvadeva |
analyzed: śrutvā yaḥ tantra rāje jinavara caritam ca abhiṣekam gṛhītvā īrṣyāḥ bhūyas karoti praviśati narakam yāvat eva

original: yasmin tasmād grāhyo'bhiṣe ko nahi bhavati nṛṇāṃ yāvadīrṣyāsti citte || 220 ||
analyzed: yasmin tasmāt grāhyaḥ bhiṣe kaḥ nahi bhavati nṛṇām yāvat īrṣyā asti citte

original: sūcyagrabhūmāvaśubhaphalavaśānnārakāḥ saṃcaranti dānaṃ śīlaṃ prapūrṇaṃ jinajanakakule kṣāntivīryaṃ ca pūrṇa dhyānaṃ prajñā'bhyupāyaḥ praṇidhirapi balaṃ jñānapūrṇa hyanena |
analyzed: sūci agra bhūmau aśubha phala vaśāt nārakāḥ saṃcaranti dānam śīlam prapūrṇam jina janaka kule kṣānti vīryam ca pūrṇa dhyānam prajñā abhyupāyaḥ praṇidhiḥ api balam jñāna pūrṇa hi

original: bhāryādānena śīghraṃ pramuditamanaso yogino janmanīha kṛtvā'smin rāgabandhaṃ narakamupagatā mohitā ye narāste || 229 ||
analyzed: bhāryā dānena śīghram pramudita manasaḥ yoginaḥ janmani iha kṛtvā smin rāga bandham narakam upagatāḥ mohitāḥ ye narāḥ te

original: pṛthvīlakṣmīnimittaṃ sucapalahṛdayastīkṣṇakhaṅgaṃ gṛhītvā yodhākīrṇe samantāt praviśati hi raṇe kātaraścāturaṅge |
analyzed: pṛthvī lakṣmī nimittam su capala hṛdayaḥ tīkṣṇa khaṅgam gṛhītvā yodha ākīrṇe samantāt praviśati hi raṇe kātaraḥ cāturaṅge

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [sādhanā- dṛṣṭvā mātaṅgavṛndaṃ patati karatalāt tasya bhītasya khaḍga- stasmin khaṅgasya doṣo nahi bhavati yathā mantrajātestathaiva || 222||
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām sādhanāḥ dṛṣṭvā mātaṅga vṛndam patati kara talāt tasya bhītasya khaḍgaḥ tasmin khaṅgasya doṣaḥ nahi bhavati yathā mantra jāteḥ tathā eva

original: mantrevarakrameṇāpya muraphaṇisurān sādhayed raudrabhūmyāṃ svādhiṣṭhānena devīḥ samayakulagatā dhyānajāpaiḥ sahomaiḥ |
analyzed: mura phaṇi surān sādhayet raudra bhūmyām svādhiṣṭhānena devīḥ samayakula gatāḥ dhyāna jāpaiḥ saha umaiḥ

original: sekaṃ śuddhakrameṇa tvanavarata mahānandacittena mantrī jñānaṃ cintāmaṇiryaṃt prabhavati ca tataśceṣa mārgo jinasya || 223 ||
analyzed: sekam śuddha krameṇa tu anavarata mahānanda cittena mantrī jñānam cintāmaṇiḥ yan prabhavati ca tatas ca iṣa mārgaḥ jinasya

original: sūtasyāgne riputvaṃ na śikhivirahitaḥ sūtabandhaḥ kadāci- nābaddho hemakartā kanakavirahitā vādināṃ naiva bhogāḥ |
analyzed: sūtasya agneḥ ripu tvam na śikhi virahitaḥ sūta bandhaḥ kadācid nā ābaddhaḥ hema kartā kanaka virahitāḥ vādinām nā eva bhogāḥ

original: evaṃ strīsaṅgahīno nahi bhavati sadā yogināṃ cittabandho nābaddhaḥ kāyavedhī sahaja sukhamihāviddhakāyo dadāti || 224 ||
analyzed: evam strī saṅga hīnaḥ nahi bhavati sadā yoginām citta bandhaḥ na ābaddhaḥ kāya vedhī sahaja sukham iha āviddha kāyaḥ dadāti

original: udyāne parvate vā janamṛgarahite sādhayet saumyamantrān raudrān raudraśmaśāne suravarabhavane stambhanaṃ mohanaṃ ca |
analyzed: udyāne parvate vā jana mṛga rahite sādhayet saumya mantrān raudrān raudra śmaśāne suravara bhavane stambhanam mohanam ca

original: vaśyākṛṣṭiśca mantrī paramavibhusukhaṃ sarvamudrāprasaṅge anyasthāne'nyayonī nahi bhavati nṛṇāṃ janmalakṣaiśca siddhiḥ || 225 ||
analyzed: vaśyā ākṛṣṭiḥ ca mantrī parama vibhu sukham sarva mudrā prasaṅge anya sthāne nyayonī nahi bhavati nṛṇām janma lakṣaiḥ ca siddhiḥ

original: veśmagrāme'kṣisūtredina niśisamaye mantrajāpaṃ hi kṛtvā śrānto mūḍho virakto vadati punaridaṃ mantrasiddhiśca nāsti |
analyzed: veśma grāme niśi samaye mantra jāpam hi kṛtvā śrāntaḥ mūḍhaḥ viraktaḥ vadati punar idam mantra siddhiḥ ca nā asti

original: sthānaṃ śūnyaṃ ca kālaṃ paramaniśigataṃ naiva jānāti samyag rogaḥ pādāṅgulīṣu prati śirasi karotyauṣadhībhiḥ pralepam ||226 ||
analyzed: sthānam śūnyam ca kālam parama niśi gatam na eva jānāti samyak rogaḥ pāda aṅgulīṣu prati śirasi karoti auṣadhībhiḥ pralepam

original: na dhyānaṃ mantrajāpaḥ karaṇamapi mahāmaṇḍalānyāsanāni homo mantrapratiṣṭhā rajasi jinakulāvāhanaṃ preṣaṇaṃ ca |
analyzed: na dhyānam mantra jāpaḥ karaṇam api mahā maṇḍalāni āsanāni homaḥ mantra pratiṣṭhā rajasi jina kula āvāhanam preṣaṇam ca

original: mudrāsi ddhi dadāti pravaravibhusukhaṃ sarvamudrāprasaṅge tasmāt tadbhāvanīyaṃ pratidinasamaye yoginā mokṣahetoḥ || 227 ||
analyzed: dadāti pravara vibhu sukham sarva mudrā prasaṅge tasmāt tat bhāvanīyam prati dina samaye yoginā mokṣa hetoḥ

original: mūrcchā nidrāṃ praviṣṭaṃ bhavati narapate niḥsvabhāvaṃ svacittaṃ jāgrāyāṃ sasvabhāvaṃ prakaṭayati na tat prāṇināṃ mokṣamārgam |
analyzed: mūrcchā nidrām praviṣṭam bhavati narapate niḥsvabhāvam sva cittam jāgrāyām sa svabhāvam prakaṭayati na tat prāṇinām mokṣa mārgam

original: bhāvābhāvaivibhinnaṃ nahi samasukhadaṃ yogināṃ cittavatraṃ svaprajñāliṅgitaṃ yat sahajasukhagataṃ mokṣadaṃ tatsvacittam || 228 ||
analyzed: bhāva abhāvaiḥ vibhinnam nahi sama sukha dam yoginām citta vatram sva prajñā liṅgitam yat sahaja sukha gatam mokṣa dam tat sva cittam

original: paṭale, - ślo. ] nānāsādhanamahoddeśaḥ oṃ āḥ hū~ hoḥ kramasthaiḥ prathamamiha sadā bodhayecchodhayitvā madyaṃ prajvālayitvā drutaśaśinamivābhāvayitvā krameṇa |
analyzed: paṭale nānā sādhana mahoddeśaḥ om āḥ hū hoḥ krama sthaiḥ prathamam iha sadā bodhayet śodhayitvā madyam prajvālayitvā druta śaśinam iva ābhāvayitvā krameṇa

original: tatpātrād bindunā vai śaśikarakamalānāmikāgreṇa bhūmyāṃ kṛtvā bāhye trikoṇaṃ dinakarasadṛśaṃ vartulaṃ tasya madhye || 229 ||
analyzed: tad pātrāt bindunā vai śaśi kara kamala anāmikā agreṇa bhūmyām kṛtvā bāhye trikoṇam dinakara sadṛśam vartulam tasya madhye

original: tanmadhye jñānacakraṃ tribhavamapi gataṃ bhāvayitvā sa mantrī aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ pratidinasamaye tarpaṇādyaṃ karoti |
analyzed: tad madhye jñāna cakram tri bhavam api gatam bhāvayitvā sa mantrī aṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām prati dina samaye tarpaṇa ādyam karoti

original: deśagrāmādhipānāṃ prathamamiha bali cādimadhyāntanāmnā hārītyāḥ piṇḍake dve punarapi ca baliṃ krodharājāya mantrī || 230 ||
analyzed: deśa grāma adhipānām prathamam iha bali ca ādi madhya anta nāmnā hārītyāḥ piṇḍake dve punar api ca balim krodha rājāya mantrī

original: dūtīnāṃ grāsamagraṃ kṣititalanilaye bhartṛvajñe dadāti bhūtānāṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ paṭhati punarimāṃ dānagāyāṃ śubhārtham |
analyzed: dūtīnām grāsam agram kṣiti tala nilaye bhartṛ vajñe dadāti bhūtānām bhukta śeṣam paṭhati punar imām dāna gāyām śubha artham

original: aṅganyāsaṃ svavatreḥ śirasi galahṛdornābhiguhye ca mūrdhni nidrākāle'ṅgavaktrairubhayakulagatairarcane maithune ca ||231||
analyzed: aṅganyāsam sva vatreḥ śirasi gala hṛdoḥ nābhi guhye ca mūrdhni nidrā kāle ṅga vaktraiḥ ubhaya kula gataiḥ arcane maithune ca
atas catvāriṃśat vṛttāni su bodhāni

original: “yaḥ śabdo hṛtpradeśe  ityādinā dūtīnāṃ grāsamagram  iti paryantaṃ katipaya- vṛttāni subodhāni, katipayavṛttānyabhiṣekapaṭale'dhyāhāreṇoktāni kāryavaśāditi ||| - ||
analyzed: yaḥ śabdaḥ hṛd pradeśe ityādinā dūtīnām grāsam agram iti paryantam su bodhāni katipaya vṛttāni abhiṣeka paṭale dhyāhāreṇa uktāni kārya vaśāt iti

original: idānīṃ lokottaralaukika siddhaye devatālambanamucyate- pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividhamapi bhaved devatālambanaṃ yat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogāduḍuriva gagane'neka sambhogakāyam |
analyzed: idānīm lokottara laukika siddhaye devatā ālambanam ucyate pratyakṣam ca anumānam dvividham api bhavet devatā ālambanam yat pratyakṣam tattva yogāt uḍuḥ iva gagane sambhoga kāyam

original: apratya kṣe'numānaṃ mṛtakatanurivāttattvataḥ kalpanaṃ ya- ccitrādī darśanīyaṃ hyapariṇatadhiyāṃ yogināṃ bhāvanārtham || 232 ||
analyzed: a pratyakṣe numānam mṛtaka tanuḥ kalpanam yat citra ādī darśanīyam hi apariṇata dhiyām yoginām bhāvanā artham
pratyakṣam ityādi

original: iha sattvānāmāśayavaśena yogināṃ pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ dvividhamapi bhaveddevatālambanaṃ yat |
analyzed: iha sattvānām āśaya vaśena yoginām pratyakṣam ca anumānam dvividham api bhavet devatā ālambanam yat

original: tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoryat pratyakṣaṃ tattvayogād gagane uḍuriva bhavet tārācakramivānekasaṃbhogakāyamiti |
analyzed: tayoḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ yat pratyakṣam tattva yogāt gagane uḍuḥ iva bhavet tārā cakram iva aneka saṃbhoga kāyam iti
māṃsa ādi cakṣuḥ grāhyam māyā svapna sadṛśam tri bhavam tri adhvani

original: atra prathamaṃ māṃsacakṣuṣā yogī ādikarmako viśvaṃ paśyatyabhijñā- bhirvinā |
analyzed: atra prathamam māṃsacakṣuṣā yogī ādi karmakaḥ viśvam paśyati abhijñāḥ bhiḥ vinā
tatas divya cakṣuṣā paśyati abhijñā vidhi vaśāt
tatas buddha cakṣuṣā paśyati
vīta rāga avadhi vaśataḥ
tatas prajñā cakṣuṣā paśyati bodhisattva avadhi vaśataḥ
tatas ca bhavati
jñāna cakṣuṣā paśyati samyaksaṃbodha avadhi citta vaśāt sarva upadhi vinirmuktaḥ iti

original: evaṃ tathāgatasya pañcacakṣūṃṣi māṃsādīni śūnyatādarśanaṃ prati
analyzed: evam tathāgatasya pañca cakṣūṃṣi māṃsa ādīni śūnyatā darśanam prati
anye sattvāḥ śūnyatā darśana viṣaye jāti andhāḥ iti

original: evaṃ vistaro vakṣyamāṇe paramākṣarajñānasiddhau vaktavya iti tattva- bhāvanā niyamaḥ
analyzed: evam vistaraḥ vakṣyamāṇe parama akṣara jñāna siddhau vaktavyaḥ iti tattva bhāvanā niyamaḥ

original: atattvasādhane punarapratyakṣe'numānaṃ mṛtakatanurivātattvataḥ kalpanaṃ yaccitrādau darśanīyamiti
analyzed: atattva sādhane punar apratyakṣe numānam mṛtaka tanuḥ iva atattvataḥ kalpanam yat citra ādau darśanīyam iti

original: evaṃ pratimā ghaṭitā citritā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ maṇḍala- cakraṃ vā likhitvā niyatākāraṃ darśanīyaṃ bālayogināṃ mandānāṃ bhāvanārthamiti vikalpabhāvanāniyamaḥ || 232 ||
analyzed: evam pratimā ghaṭitā citritā buddha bodhisattvānām cakram vā likhitvā niyata ākāram darśanīyam bāla yoginām mandānām bhāvanā artham iti vikalpa bhāvanā niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ vikalpabhāvanāyā upāya ucyate- rūpaṃ vā maṇḍalaṃ vā prathamamapi paṭestattvato bhāvanīyaṃ ākāśe tattvayogāt sakalamavikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittam
analyzed: idānīm vikalpa bhāvanāyāḥ upāyaḥ ucyate rūpam vā maṇḍalam vā prathamam api paṭeḥ tattvataḥ bhāvanīyam ākāśe tattva yogāt sakalam avikalam dṛśyamānam sva cittam

original: varṣādhaṃ varṣamekaṃ guruniyamavaśād yāvadeva sthiraṃ syā- nmudrāsaṅgena tasmāt katipayadivasa~rakṣaratvaṃ prayāti ||233||
analyzed: varṣa adham varṣam ekam guru niyama vaśāt yāvat eva sthiram syāt mudrā saṅgena tasmāt rakṣara tvam prayāti
rūpam ityādi

original: iha bālayogināṃ svacittaśaktyā rūpamityekadevatā paṭe likhitā bhāvanīyā, maṇḍalaṃ vā pratha mamapi paṭe'tattvato bhāvanīyam
analyzed: iha bāla yoginām sva citta śaktyā rūpam iti eka devatā paṭe likhitā bhāvanīyā maṇḍalam vā prathamam api paṭe tattvataḥ bhāvanīyam
sva cittam iti
tattvataḥ punar ākāśe tattva yogāt iti śūnyatā karuṇā yogāt

original: sakalamavikalaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ svacittaṃ sarvākāraṃ rūpamaṇḍalacakra kalpanā'bhāvāditi
analyzed: sakalam avikalam dṛśyamānam sva cittam sarva ākāram rūpa maṇḍala cakra kalpanā bhāvāt iti

original: evaṃ rūpādikaṃ kalpitaṃ paṭe likhitaṃ vā śūnyatābimbama 'vikalpaṃ vā varṣādhaṃ varṣamekaṃ vā guruniyamavaśād yāvadeva sthiraṃ syāt svacittam
analyzed: evam rūpa ādikam kalpitam paṭe likhitam vā śūnyatā bimbam a vikalpam vā varṣa adham varṣam ekam vā guru niyama vaśāt yāvat eva sthiram syāt sva cittam
mudrā saṅgena tasmāt iti

original: iha svacitte pratyāhāradhyāna- prāṇāyāmadhāraṇābalena sthire jāte sati tato mudrāsaṅgena katipayadivasairiti kāla- cakadinaiḥ pañcaviṃśatyadhikekādaśaśatairiti niyamaḥ
analyzed: iha sva citte pratyāhāra dhyāna prāṇāyāma dhāraṇā balena sthire jāte sati tatas mudrā saṅgena katipaya divasaiḥ iti kāla caka dinaiḥ pañcaviṃśati adhika ekādaśa śataiḥ iti niyamaḥ
ebhiḥ dinaiḥ bodhi cittam akṣara tvam prayāti vaimalyam bhavati iti sambandhaḥ

original: atra 'paṭapustakapratimālikhanāya upasthāpako dharmabhāṇako' nveṣaṇīyaḥ, tena paṭapustaka pratimādikaṃ kartavyaṃ raudrasaumyakriyayā
analyzed: atra paṭa pustaka pratimā likhanāya upasthāpakaḥ dharma bhāṇakaḥ nveṣaṇīyaḥ tena paṭa pustaka pratimā ādikam kartavyam raudra saumya kriyayā
pūrva uktam arthāḥ dikam dattvā ca āryasya pūjā kāryā
saṃgha bhojyam gaṇa cakram ca dātavyam argha dāna kāle

original: yathā pratiṣṭhā- kāle vidhi:, tathārghadānakāle'pi yathāśaktita: kārya iti niyamaḥ || 233 ||
analyzed: yathā pratiṣṭhā kāle tathā argha dāna kāle kāryaḥ iti niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ vajrapadaniyama ucyate- sarvasmitantrarāje khalu kuliśapadaṃ yogināmetaduktaṃ bālānāṃ pācanāthaṃ paramakaruṇayā gopitaṃ viśvabhartrā
analyzed: idānīm vajra pada niyamaḥ ucyate sarvasmin tantrarāje khalu kuliśa padam yoginām etat uktam bālānām pācanātham parama karuṇayā gopitam viśvabhartrā

original: tasmāt taṃ bhedayitvā pratidinasamaye yoginā bhāvanīyaṃ mudrā siddhayarthahetojinavarajanakā'nāhataṃ || iti sādhanāpaṭalacaturthaḥ || kālacakram || 234 ||
analyzed: tasmāt tam bhedayitvā prati dina samaye yoginā bhāvanīyam mudrā siddhaya artha hetoḥ jina vara janakā na ahatam iti sādhanā paṭala caturthaḥ kālacakram

original: ka. evaṃ vāguro ga. eṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ
analyzed: kaḥ evam vāguraḥ gaḥ eṣām ca teṣām

original: ka. kha. ga. ca. cha. niṣiktā

ca
paṭale s laḥ nānā sāghana mahā uddeśaḥ sarvasmin ityādi

original: iha sarvasmastantrarāje samājādike upāyatantre, cakrasaṃvarā- dike prajñātantre khalu kuliśapadaṃ pūrvoktamakṣarasukhaṃ yogināmiti
analyzed: iha sarvasmaḥ tantrarāje samāja ādike upāya tantre cakra saṃvara ādike prajñā tantre khalu kuliśa padam pūrva uktam akṣara sukham yoginām iti

original: taduktaṃ bhagavatā - tadyathā bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃbuddho'kārasambhavaḥ
analyzed: tat uktam bhagavatā tat yathā bhagavān buddhaḥ saṃbuddhaḥ kāra sambhavaḥ
akāraḥ sarva varṇāgyaḥ mahārthaḥ parama akṣaraḥ
mahā prāṇaḥ hi anutpādaḥ vāc udāhāra vajitaḥ
sarva

original: ityādi, jñānakāya namo namaḥ iti paryantaṃ dvāṣaṣṭyadhika- śatavṛttenokto jñānakāyo nāmasaṃgītyām
analyzed: ityādi jñānakāya namaḥ namaḥ iti paryantam dvāṣaṣṭi adhika śata vṛttena uktaḥ jñānakāyaḥ nāmasaṃgītyām
saḥ eva kuliśapadam ucyate
sarvasmin tantrarāje

original: tadeva bālānāṃ pācanāthaṃ paramakaruṇayā gopitaṃ viśvabha dvīndriya- sukhaṃ pratipāditaṃ bālānāmiti
analyzed: tat eva bālānām pācanātham parama karuṇayā gopitam bālānām iti

original: tasmāt taṃ kuliśapadaṃ bhedayitvā pratidinasamaye'- harniśaṃ yogineti tīkṣṇendriyeṇa pūrvoktacakṣuṣā bhāvanīyaṃ mudrāsiddhi nimittamiti mahāmudrāsiddhaye
analyzed: tasmāt tam kuliśa padam bhedayitvā prati dina samaye harniśam yoginā iti tīkṣṇa indriyeṇa pūrva ukta cakṣuṣā bhāvanīyam nimittam iti mahāmudrā siddhaye
kim tat

original: jinavarajanakā'nāhataṃ kālacakraṃ taditi niyamo bhagavataḥ sarvatantrāntare yogibhiravagantavyaḥ saṃbuddhapadalābhāyeti
analyzed: jinavara janakāḥ na ahatam kālacakram tat iti niyamaḥ bhagavataḥ sarva tantra antare yogibhiḥ avagantavyaḥ saṃbuddha pada lābhāya iti

original: iti śrīmūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ nānāsāghana mahoddeśaḥ pañcamaḥ || sādhanāpaṭalasya ṭīkā samāptā
analyzed: iti śrī mūlatantra anusāriṇyām laghukālacakra tantrarāja ṭīkāyām vimalaprabhāyām dvādaśa sāhasrikāyām nānā sāghana mahoddeśaḥ pañcamaḥ sādhanā paṭalasya ṭīkā samāptā
tad maṇḍala tritaya bodhita śe ka ratnarāja prabodhita bhuvaḥ paramāt bhūta arthāḥ

original: uktastu sādhayitumiṣṭatamaḥ parārthaṃ nānārthasādhanavidhiḥ sa ṣaḍaṅgayogaḥ || prāptaṃ mayā kuśalamāvukadattakena saṃlekhya sādhanavidheḥ paṭalaṃ hi tena
analyzed: uktaḥ tu sādhayitum iṣṭatamaḥ para artham nānā artha sādhana vidhiḥ sa ṣaḍaṅga yogaḥ prāptam mayā kuśalam āvukadattakena saṃlekhya sādhana vidheḥ paṭalam hi tena
lokottara advaya sukha ākara ratna mūrdhnā jñāna eka cakṣuḥ amalaḥ sakalaḥ astu lokaḥ
